2000.name: Roger
2000.n0: Open your item inventory and you'll find equip., use, set-up, etc. and cash tabs.
2000.n1: The item you pick up is automatically stored in an appropriate item category. What do you think? Isn't it cool?
2000.n2: Double-click on an item in the item inventory and you'll be able to use it.
2000.f0: You want to discard an item? Then click on an item in the inventory, and drag it out of the window.
2000.f1: If your item inventory is full, you won't be able to take in new items. You should take care of the unimportant ones by either discarding them or selling them at a store.
2000.f2: Use items can also be stored on the bottom right tray where you can assign HotKey's...
2000.w0: You'll die once your HP reaches 0, so it's for your own good to take a potion or food before it's too late.
2000.w1: You want to travel now? Then come talk to me...
2000.w2: If you want to talk to someone, click on them
2000.d1: Did it help you a lot? Farewell my dear Mapler!

2001.name: Sen
2001.d0: There is nothing to eat in here~ oh...
2001.d1: What did my sister say? oh~ I am so hungry...

2002.name: Peter
2002.n0: You should train yourself well before going on the journey.
2002.n2: This is the exit to the Mushroom Town.
2002.f0: If you want to move on to the next stage, talk to me.
2002.f1: Be careful...once you leave this place, you'll see monsters roaming around.
2002.w0: So you're ready for the adventure?
2002.w1: Now it's all up to you to train yourself. Good luck!
2002.w2: We instructors are all related. Roger, my older brother, and Robin, my younger brother, all work together here.
2002.h1: So what's my relationship with Roger? Hahaha...he's my older brother!

2003.name: Robin
2003.n0: Be careful! You'll see monsters around here.
2003.n2: Press Z and you'll be able to pick up the item the monster drops.
2003.n3: If it's a powerful monster, how about teaming up with someone else?
2003.f0: You need to time the attack right to take down the monsters easily.
2003.f1: The town you just saw is called Mushroom Town. You'll also find places called Southperry and Amherst on this island.
2003.f2: If you want to head over to a bigger, wider area, try heading up northeast.
2003.w0: You met up with my brothers Roger and Peter before, right?

2004.name: Todd
2004.n1: You can attack the monsters, if you press "Ctrl".
2004.n2: You can pick up the items, if you press "z".
2004.n3: If the monsters are strong, how about making a party with other players?
2004.f0: You should attack the monsters with the right timing
2004.f1: That was "Mushroom Town". There are Amherst and South Perry in this Island
2004.w0: If you go there, you might see Robin
2004.d0: If you don't know where to go, I will let you know.

2005.name: Sam
2005.n0: You can be even stronger, if you get a lesson from Mai
2005.n1: Go to the right and then you can meet bunch of other people
2005.n2: Press "w" to see the current position.
2005.n3: How about partying with other players?
2005.f0: You should attack the monsters with the right timing
2005.f1: You would see lot of new things if you go to Amherst
2005.w0: Even if you don't know the way, just go~
2005.d1: So you did see Mia huh?

2006.name: Tienk
2006.n0: There is a saying that goes <Know Your Enemy>. Don not you want to know more about the monsters you'll be facing?
2006.n1: Every gatherer finds joy in gathering small things.
2006.n2: Wahahaha, how do you like my collection of items?
2006.d0: Hey there, my name is Tienk, and I only recommend the best of the best!
2006.d1: Hey there, my name is Tienk, and I only recommend the best of the best!

2009.name: Bobby Buzzcut
2009.n0: I found these tools. Do you think they'll do the trick?"
2009.n1: Heh... are you sure you want to give this a try?

2100.name: Sera
2100.n0: It's a neverending pile of laundry I'll be hanging around here.
2100.n1: Have you met my sister Heena before?
2100.n2: Press? and you'll be able to climb up the ladder or a rope.
2100.n3: Click on us, and you'll be able to talk to us.
2100.a0: Why isn't Heena helping me hang all this laundry?
2100.s0: You must be on you first journey, am I right?
2100.i0: What should I make for dinner...?
2100.l0: Oh my gosh, my laundry! still left to do...
2100.h0: Haven't washed my hair in days...and...
2100.d0: It is a fine day to do the laundry~ Don't you think so?
2100.d1: Did you give my mirror to #g#p2101##k? When will she help me to do this...

2101.name: Heena
2101.n1: Press left Alt key and  you'll be able to jump.
2101.n2: Press the arrow keys to move around here and there.
2101.d0: You must be a new traveller. I will give some instructions which will be very useful. If you want to speak with us, you can just simply click us. You can move by pressing #bLeft and Right Arrows#k and jump by pressing #bAlt#k. Come on~ Try it! Also, sometimes you have to climb up a ladder or use a rope to get to the destination you want. You can do that by pressing the #bUp Arrow#k. Please keep this in mind.
2101.d1: Now I can take a look at my face with this mirror. Phew~~ I'm still alright.

2102.name: Nina
2102.n0: What would be good for dinner?
2102.d1: I will make a mushroom soup for #p2001#. Is there a fresh mushroom?

2103.name: Maria
2103.n0: Ahh...I need to get this letter sent...
2103.l0: Whoa, time's going fast...it may be too late...
2103.d0: I should bring this to #m1010000#... What should I do... hmm...
2103.d1: Now I can deliver important news to the town. Thanks a lot. Are you using the hat, I gave you? How is that? Pretty good, huh?

10000.name: Pio
10000.n0: Do you need my help by any chance? I can handle machinery really well...
10000.n1: I just ate a little bit ago...and yet I'm hungry already...!!
10000.n2: Phew...work is hard. I need to take a break.
10000.d0: Hmmm... I guess these things must be very useful in some places...
10000.d1: Ah!  You are the one who collected stuff for me. You will get to have a job, soon. Oh, you didn't know that? If you get to the lv. 8, you can be a Magician. Also, you should be at least lv. 10 to become a Bowman, a Warrior, a Thief, and a Pirate. You cannot do those in this Island, so take a ship from the South Perry and go to the Victoria Island.

10200.name: Athena Pierce
10200.s0: Do you wish to learn the way of the Bowman?

10201.name: Grendel the Really Old
10201.s0: Those who wish to become a Magician, follow me.

10202.name: Dances with Balrog
10202.s0: Do you wish to know more about Warriors?

10203.name: Dark Lord
10203.s0: Hey you! So you want to become a Thief?

10204.name: Kyrin
10204.n0: Not everyone can become a Pirate!
10204.n1: Not everyone can become a Pirate!

11100.name: Lucy
11100.n1: Hey you!! Don't even think about stealing in here...
11100.n2: You definitely need potions to travel

12000.name: Lucas
12000.n1: I'm not too fond of the strangers. I'm only worried about the peace of this town.
12000.n2: You...if you're strong and powerful, can you take care of the monsters around town?
12000.d0: A letter from #r#p2103##k should be here, any minute. Is there something wrong? Hmm...
12000.d1: You safely delivered my reply to #r#p2103##k? Thanks~ so #r#p2103##k gave you a present? Haha... He is one of the best for making a hat....

12100.name: Mai
12100.n0: Do you know me by any chance? You don't? What's wrong with you?
12100.n1: If you are thinking of challenging me, I suggest you keep dreaming...
12100.n2: Is there anyone that can satisfy my desire to fight...?
12100.d0: You can be much stronger, if you get to be trained by me. Come to me, whenever you are ready.
12100.d1: How about going to the world out there?

12101.name: Rain
12101.n0: Isn't it nice out here today?
12101.n1: To jump, press the left Alt key.
12101.n2: Press the arrow keys to move around here and there.
12101.d0: Ready to try the maple Quiz?
12101.d1: Right~! You are the one who solved all the quiz. Anyway, How are you?

20000.name: John
20000.n0: How about buying one of these fishes?
20000.n1: I used to be an adventurer myself...but now I don't mind living a normal life...
20000.n2: You don't need to be that scared of it. I've walked away from that lifestyle long ago.
20000.d0: Is there anyone who can help me? Well... I would like to go by myself, but as you can see, I have lots of stuff to do...
20000.d1: You are the one, who brought the flower to me. Again, thanks a lot.. Feel free to stay in this town.

20001.d1: It might be only few tree branches but it will be a big help when gathered.  It could build a boat that sails over the sea.
20001.name: Bari
20001.d0: I am good at making anything!  Since my uncle is Pio in Amherst, he used to teach me lots of things when I was young.

20002.name: Biggs
20002.n0: Hmm...looks like I'm still the best looking man in this town.
20002.n1: Hey you! What are you looking at! If you're admiring at my good looks, might as well say it!!
20002.n2: One of these days, I'll be the one operating that huge ship, and take off to a far bigger land...
20002.d0: I can't stay in this town forever. Is there anyone who can help me?
20002.d1: Thanks for the last time. Now, if I get just little more money, I probably can start the business. Are you still using the weapon, which I gave you?

20100.name: Yoona
20100.n0: Whoa, what are you looking at?!?!
20100.d0: When will I be able to explore the bigger world outside of Maple Island?
20100.d1: Even if it is Orange Mushroom, not Red Snail, It doesn't bother me a bit.  I have been training with Maya for a long time! ^^  Oh, this is a secret just between you and me!

21000.name: Pan
21000.n0: Let's see...I'm ready to make some money...
21000.n1: Hello everyone! I've got some goods here for sale!!
21000.n2: Anyone that steals will not go unpunished!!

22000.name: Shanks
22000.n0: I am the captain, dang it!! Don't be looking down on me!
22000.n1: I'll take you anywhere you want

1001001.name: Natasha

1001001.n2: Anyone that steals will feel my wrath!!!

1001100.name: Mina
1001100.n2: It's a must that you get some potions if you want to go on a journey.
1001100.n1: Whoa there, no stealing around here!!!

1002001.n2: The incredible feeling of sailing along the beautiful coast ... that's what life is all about!
1002001.d0: I heard that #p1012101# is sick again. Sad...
1002001.d1: Oh~ So it seems that you have delievered #b#t4031006##k to #p1012101#...! Thanks. Now #p1012101# can get better now. huh? #t4031004# It is still very beautiful~

1002002.name: Pason

1002002.n1: There's a gorgeous beach called Florina Beach near Victoria Island...

1002003.name: Mr. Goldstein

1002003.n1: If you need to expand your buddy list, how about doing some business with me? Harharhar...

1002005.name: Mr. Kim
1002005.n0: You need a place to store your items and mesos? This is just the place for you!
1002005.n1: My storage is safe and secure, so no worries!

1002006.name: Chef
1002006.n0: Who am I? Well...who AM I?
1002006.n1: If you have a secret scroll by any chance, would you mind showing that to me?
1002006.d0: What are you here fore? Are you here because of my ravishing good looks?
1002006.d1: If you're done with me, then I suggest you leave soon. I'm a very busy person...

1002100.name: Jane
1002100.n1: Why does my dad not want me to travel around?
1002100.d0: My dream is to travel all over the world.... Just like you... But my father just doesn't let me...
1002100.d1: So It is you. Thanks for the materials you get. If you need something, please let me know.

1002101.name: Olaf
1002101.n1: Look at me~ Do you want to be strong like me?
1002101.d0: Look at me~ Do you want to be strong like me?

1002101.s0: You know that it is about time to choose your job!
1002101.s1: What? Strong Warrior? Dances with Barlog will help you~
1002101.s2: If you want to become a Bowman, go and meet Athena Pierce in Henessys.
1002101.s3: If you choose to become a Magician, you can have a job faster than anybody. Go and meet Grendel the Really Old in Ellinia
1002101.s4: You want to be a Thief like Dark Lord? You know where to go~

1002102.name: Eels
1002102.n1: Hmmm... what you'll need to today is..
1002102.d0: I mean, since I decided to move to Lith Harbor, I made up my mind to help out the good people here. One request turns to two, two to three, and... there's just so many now! I am beginning to wonder how they functioned here without me.
1002102.d1: I mean, since I decided to move to Lith Harbor, I made up my mind to help out the good people here. One request turns to two, two to three, and... there's just so many now! I am beginning to wonder how they functioned here without me.

1002103.name: Captain Al
1002103.n0: Try being in the Family. You'll realize how much easier life can get with a supportive family...
1002103.n1: Hello there, I'm Captain Al. I've been acting as the leader of a Family for 30 years now. Do you have any questions about the Family?
1002103.d0: Try being in the Family. You'll realize how much easier life can get with a supportive family...
1002103.d1: Hello there, I'm Captain Al. I've been acting as the leader of a Family for 30 years now. Do you have any questions about the Family?

1002104.name: Tru

1002104.d0: What kind of information are you looking for? Don't be shy!
1002104.d1: What kind of information are you looking for? Don't be shy!

1010100.name: Rina

1010100.n1: If you want to become a Bowman, please go see Athena Pierce, who resides in the inner part of the park.
1010100.n2: Hmm...is Ronnie doing well? I can't find him...I was thinking of fixing him a nice plate of Unagi.
1010100.d0: This town is made by the group of bowmen. If you want to become a Bowman, please meet with #r#p1012100##k... She will help you. What? You don't know #r#p1012100##k? She saved our town long time ago from the monsters. Of course, it is safe now. She is the hero of our town.
1010100.d1: Oh... You are the one who gave the stuff back? So what's up? Is #p1012102 doing fine? If you get to #m100000000# someday, please say hello to #p1012102# for me

1011001.name: Sam
1011001.n1: Ahem, I only deal with the finest of all items...

1011100.name: Luna
1011100.n0: Yawn, I'm tired... just go choose an item you want ...

1012001.name: Dr. Squint
1012001.n0: I've been wearing these for so long, I can barely see what's in front of me...
1012001.n1: Ah, you want to get your face done? Cough, cough...
1012001.n2: Plastic surgery..let me take care of it...haha...wait, where's the face?

1012003.name: Chief Stan
1012003.n1: Hey, you! I strongly suggest you don't do anything stupid around this town...
1012003.d0: My Son...! That ungrateful kid... He just didn't listen to me and ran out. I can never ever forgive him...! He can never come to this town again...!
1012003.d1: Did you give the gold watch to Alex? I feel so lonely without him... Anyway, can you please tell him that I will forgive him and he can come home now.

1012004.name: Doofus

1012004.n1: Do you need to get some food for your pet?

1012005.n1: Are you raising a pet? If you have any questions, feel free to ask

1012006.n1: Hehehe ... if you need to train your pet, I'll take care of it...

1012007.name: Trainer Frod
1012007.n0: Hmmm ... my brother keeps making me do these dumb assignments ...
1012007.n1: Taking a walk around town with your pet...isn't that the best feeling in the world??

1012008.name: Casey
1012008.n0: You tired of hunting? How about playing a minigame?
1012008.n1: Still no one to beat me...I'm the master of minigames...

1012009.name: Mr. Lee
1012009.n0: You need a place to store your items and mesos? This is just the place for you!
1012009.n1: My storage is safe and secure, so no worries!

1012100.name: Athena Pierce

1012100.d0: Those who want to become a Bowman... Please come...
1012100.d1: Those who want to become a Bowman... Please come...

1012101.name: Maya

1012101.d1: Thanks for the last time. Now I feel much better. Thanks for everything.

1012102.name: Pia
1012102.d0: Ah~! It is really getting to me!!! #o2220100#... Oh... Are you a stranger?
1012102.d1: Thanks for the last time. Now #o2220100# is about to extinct. So how was the scroll?

1012103.name: Natalie
1012103.n0: You like my hairstyle? We hairdressers are supposed to keep up with the latest trends, you know?
1012103.n1: Are you tired of your hairdo? Here, let me make it look nice and pretty for you...

1012104.name: Brittany
1012104.n0: I'm Brittany the assistant, in charge of dying hair...
1012104.n1: Natalie is my mother and the owner of this place.

1012105.name: Ms. Tan
1012105.n0: These days, everyone wants to tan their skin...
1012105.n1: There's nothing as healthy-looking as a well-tanned skin. What do you think? Do you want to tan it like me?
1012105.n2: Every once in a while, someone comes along that wants a clean, white skin. That's ok, too.

1012106.name: Mrs. Ming Ming
1012106.s0: With my food, I can definitely win the trophy in the festival.
1012106.s1: Hmmm... Now... I need more ingredients...
1012106.s2: It will be great... I guarantee you...
1012106.d0: We are lacking man power. We should get some help from the people who came from other places...
1012106.d1: Thanks for doing that. Now we can prepare for the festival.

1012107.name: Utah
1012107.s0: What should I do after feeding the pigs?
1012107.s1: Today is my birthday... Probably something good will happen to me
1012107.s2: Hmm... I should talk to Camilla after feeding the pigs...
1012107.d1: I should rush back to Camila. You can exit the farm, if you take left here.

1012108.name: Camila
1012108.s0: Today is Utah's birthday... I should give a birthday present to him...
1012108.s1: I don't really like angry ribbon pigs.
1012108.s2: Utah may get really disappointed if I don't get him the presents.
1012108.d1: Ah, you're the one that helped me out the other day. Thank you so much for that time!

1012109.name: Jay
1012109.s0: I need to take great care of the Maple History Book. It contains lots of important information, you know!
1012109.s1: I really hope Henesys stays peaceful. I grew up here!
1012109.d0: I really love it here, and my goal is to make Henesys an even better place to live.
1012109.d1: You're the one that helped me recover the history book. Your good deeds will be remembered for generations to come!

1012110.name: Anne
1012110.n0: When's Mom coming? She must be busy...
1012110.n1: I can only do this by myself for so long...
1012110.d0: I'm Anne, the daughter of Dr. Betty
1012110.d1: Hey, you wanna hang out with me?

1012111.name: Bruce
1012111.s0: Sometimes you can find amazing things, if you study monsters.
1012111.s1: I am a scholar who studies animals and monsters
1012111.d1: You are the one who helped me on the other day. How are you?

1012112.name: Tory

1012112.s1: No one comes close to Moon Bunny when it comes to making rice cakes.
1012112.d1: I'm bored. Anything fun to do?

1012113.name: Tommy

1012113.d1: I want to try the rice cakes made by Moon Bunny...

1012114.name: Growlie
1012114.s0: I won't eat ya if you bring me one of those delicious rice cakes~
1012114.s1: No one comes close to Moon Bunny when it comes to making rice cakes.

1012117.name: Big Headward

1012117.n1: No extra charge even if you have a big head!

1012118.name: Power B. Fore

1012118.s1: If only I were 10 years younger!

1012118.d1: Hey there! This training center is specifically designed for beginners. You'll be removed from the area once you reach Level 20, got it?

1013100.name: 애나

1013100.d1: 오후부터는 집안 청소를 해야지. 창문 닦는 건 유타에게 시키면 되겠지?

1013101.name: 유타
1013101.d0: 오늘은 돼지농장에 늦게 나가도 되는 날이야. 그래도 오후부터는 일 도우러 갈 생각이지만.
1013101.d1: 오늘은 돼지농장에 늦게 나가도 되는 날이야. 그래도 오후부터는 일 도우러 갈 생각이지만.

1013103.name: 그리드
1013103.d0: 울타리도 고쳐야 하고 도망친 아기 돼지도 데려와야 하고... 바쁘다, 바빠.

1013203.name: 이베흐

1020000.n0: Haven't seen you before...better be careful around here.

1020000.n2: Don't you like my hair? It's very popular around town.

1020000.d1: Hey, it's you! Thanks to you, the building of the house for my cousins are well on their way. You should come check it out when it's completed.

1021001.name: Harry
1021001.n0: Let's see...I'm ready for some work here!
1021001.n1: Hello everyone! I've got some fiiine goods for ya!

1021100.name: Arturo
1021100.n1: Hey, you! No stealing around here...

1022000.n1: For those that want to become a Warrior, come see me...
1022000.d0: For those that want to become a Warrior, come see me...
1022000.d1: For those that want to become a Warrior, come see me...

1022002.name: Manji

1022002.d1: Hah... I was wondering who's bothering me, and it's you. Alright, I won't call you a nobody anymore...

1022004.n1: If you need something made, just come find me.

1022005.name: Mr. Wang

1022005.n1: My storage is safe and secure, so no worries!

1022006.s1: Do you think I can ... recover all that data that I've lost?

1022007.name: Ayan
1022007.s0: My name is Ayan. Nice to meet you~
1022007.s1: I have been living in this town ever since I was rescued by the people here.
1022007.d1: You are the one who helped me the other day. Thank you~

1022100.name: Sophia
1022100.n2: Is Maya getting better from her sickness?
1022100.s0: Not a bad day at work today!
1022100.s1: Please don't bargain with me too much~
1022100.s2: Don't they look good today? I put great effort to today's stock
1022100.h1: Please don't try to bargain with me too much~
1022100.h2: Isn't it just gorgeous out here today?
1022100.d0: Man, I want to travel around and stuff. I don't want to be stuck here working. This stinks!! I'm stuck here making potions everyday thanks to my mom opening up a convenience store. This is definitely NOT fun.
1022100.d1: What did you do with #b#t4031004##k? That's a coveted rock and all, but it requires so many items to make that you're the first one to actually gather them all up! Anyway, hope this is put to good use.

1032006.n1: My storage is safe and secure, so no worries!

1032007.name: Joel

1032007.n1: Talk to Cherry if you want to get on board!

1032008.name: Cherry

1032008.n2: The ship is about to leave, so please wait~

1032009.n2: The ship is about to leave, so please wait~

1032100.name: Arwen the Fairy
1032100.n0: Ah... my precious collection ... where are they???
1032100.n1: I don't want to ask humans for a favor ... but ... there's no choice.
1032100.d0: I lost a very important item ...
1032100.d1: You're the one that recovered the glass shoes from the menacing #o3210100# the other day. Thank you so much, and if you need my help, feel free to come talk to me.

1032101.name: Rowen the Fairy
1032101.n0: Do you think my friend Ronnie is doing well...?
1032101.n1: Deep in the forest, Zombie Lupin's are threatening the safety of our town ...
1032101.n2: A few days ago, my friend Arwen lost her red heart-shaped earrings in the middle of the forrest owned by Shane ...
1032101.d0: Do you need me for something? Please don't bother me unless you need me right this minute.
1032101.d1: It's you, my savior. #o4230101# hasn't been attacking our town ever since you helped us out the other day. How are you doing these days?

1032102.name: Mar the Fairy

1032102.n1: I've been studying on life magic for hundreds of years, but I see no end to it.

1032103.name: El Moth

1032104.d1: Thank you so much for your help! Couldn't have come at a better time!

1032105.name: Estelle

1032105.n1: No, this is not it! I need a distinctive flavor.
1032105.d0: I'm Estelle, and I love to cook!
1032105.d1: Did you like the sauce I made the other day? Did it help you on your cooking?

1032106.name: Wing the Fairy

1032106.d0: I've got a lot of work to do!
1032106.d1: I'd appreciate it if you don't bother me for now.

1032108.name: Reef
1032108.d0: ...Don't know when...but I am now... getting used to... commiting sins...
1032108.d1: If I apologize... will that be accepted?

1032112.name: Talking Tree

1040000.name: Luke
1040000.n2: This is the way to the ... dun ... geon ... zzzzzzzz ....
1040000.d0: Okay, who just woke me up?? I hate anyone that wakes me up from my nap ... huh? What am I doing? What do you think I'm doing? Of course I'm guarding the entrance!! This is the entrance to the #bVictoria Island : Center Dungeon#k. You have to be careful in there; the monsters you've faced don't even compare to the ones you're about to face in here. I suggest you don't go in there unless you can protect yourself. Okay, nap time!
1040000.d1: Hey, it's you! Am I falling asleep again? Well, I was actually called out the other day for doing that, so I've been trying NOT to these days. It's dangerous around here, so please be careful.

1040001.name: Mike
1040001.n2: This is the way to the...dun...geon...zz.zzzzzz....
1040001.d0: I found this old document the other day and it had something about this mythical item. #b#t4021009##k and #b#t4003002##k seem like items that have something to do with the fairies at Ellinia. Maybe #t4001005# has to do with the Golems that the old mages made. #b#t4001006##k reminds me of a flaming dragon...

1052000.d1: Thanks for the help the other day. I'd love to go back home, but I have to at least say my goodbyes to everyone that helped me out here. These people will actually miss me, you know ...

1061004.n1: I'm still a kid so I don't know much... but what exactly is in this book?
1061004.d0: Now what exactly is in this book that makes my dad take care of it so much? I want to know what's inside, but I don't think I'll understand it one bit...
1061004.d1: You got him the book, right? I still don't think he even cares about me. I should just go back to the fairy town and stay there.

1061005.name: Sabitrama

1061005.d1: It's you!! Thanks to the herbs you got me, the medicine is well on its way. It should be done pretty soon. Thanks again for your help.

1061008.name: Mr. Oh
