2012005.n0: There's no telling when and where you may face a powerful monster! Potions are definitely a must for every traveler!
2012005.n1: I also have various tasty dishes made by the fairies ourselves.
2012005.c0: To make a good potion like this, I need to go around from place to place everyday looking for only the finest ingredients available.
2012005.c1: I'm sure the fairies at Ellinia are doing well...right?

2012006.name: Isa the Station Guide
2012006.n0: Orbis Station is huge. I'll take you to the station platform, so talk to me.
2012006.n1: The platform is different according to the final destination. Go through me to use the platforms!

2012007.name: Rinz the Assistant
2012007.n0: Hello~! Thanks for visiting our hair salon!
2012007.n1: I may not be as good as the owner, but...how about letting me take care of your hair still?
2012007.s0: Do you want to know about the latest trends in hairstyle? I'll do it for you!
2012007.s1: Fairies love beautiful things, so I'm thinking it may help you on your journey down the road with a beautiful-looking hair.
2012007.c0: Wow, the owner is still the best of the best at this!
2012007.c1: Please don't just leave...check out the hairstyles available for a change...

2012008.name: Romi
2012008.n1: So you want the most popular skin color these days, right?
2012008.s0: What's the popular skin-color at Victoria Island?
2012008.s1: It's good to look healthy with a nicely-tanned skin

2012009.name: Riza the Assistant
2012009.n0: You...look like someone that may need a plastic surgery.
2012009.n1: How about completely redoing your face with the most popular look these days?

2012010.name: Elma the Housekeeper
2012010.n1: What's going to happen to my next paycheck if the master isn't coming back...
2012010.d0: It's been months since she left out of the blue. I haven't had much to work lately, so that's good, but I also haven't been paid in months because she's not here. I'm just worried someone else may take over this house and I may never get paid...
2012010.d1: It looks like you've been looking for her too. Do you have any idea how this all happened? I wonder where she is.

2012011.name: Kriel the Fairy
2012011.n0: Humans are just so shameless these days...they ask for favors as if it's nothing.
2012011.n1: Wow...I definitely need a hand here. I better be working hard.
2012011.d0: Lately humans have been asking for favors as if it's nothing. If they think we fairies will say yes to their every demand, well that's WRONG! Anyway, what do you want from me?
2012011.d1: Did #b#t4031051##k help you in any way shape or form? Anyway, that assistant of Spiruna ... is she doing alright? If you ever see her again, then please say hi to her for me.

2012012.name: Lisa
2012012.n1: I'm worried that monsters these days are much more ferocious...
2012012.d1: Lately I've been concerned about a bunch of aggressive monsters that may hurt me a great deal...

2012013.name: Sunny
2012013.n0: We hope you enjoy your trip!
2012013.n1: There's a set capacity for this trip, so please hurry! It's ready for takeoff really soon!
2012013.n2: The ship is about to leave, so please wait~

2012016.name: Aileen
2012016.n0: Please purchase ticket from me and get on the board.
2012016.n1: We sincerely hope you enjoy your trip!

2012017.name: Hughes the Fuse
2012017.s1: I can make everything ... I am a genious. HAHA...
2012017.d0: I need to invent something else. This is going to be good...

2012018.name: Ericsson
2012018.d0: Look at my kitty! Isn't she cute?
2012018.d1: Look at my kitty! Isn't she cute?

2012020.name: Alfonse Green
2012020.s0: Hello~ My name is Alfonse Green~
2012020.s1: There are many delicious food in the world~ I love eating~
2012020.d1: I just drank Nependeath juice~ It is so good.

2012021.name: Ramini
2012021.n0: Do you know of Leafre the town?
2012021.n1: So you want to head to Leafre, a town named to signify the fact that it's a 'Leaf Town'?

2012022.name: Pelace
2012022.n0: Leafre? It's a town~ There's a beautiful forest...there...
2012022.n1: I recommend heading to Minar Forest near Leafre.

2012024.name: Egnet
2012024.n0: Genie is leaving soon. Stay away from the safe line.
2012024.n1: During voyage, Don't shout and run around.

2012025.name: Geras
2012025.n0: Please line up in a single line.
2012025.n1: If you want to feel the hot air(wave) of Desert, go to Ariant.

2012026.name: Elliza
2012026.d1: (Elliza must be in a deep sleep.)

2013000.name: Wonky the Fairy
2013000.s1: I'm hungry hungry hungry! Anything to eat?

2013002.name: Minerva the Goddess
2013002.n1: How shall I repay you guys...
2013002.d0: I'm Minerva, the goddess of beauty and intelligence...
2013002.d1: Here's hoping your future holds nothing but greatness~!
2013002.s0: I'm Minerva, the goddess of beauty and intelligence...
2013002.s1: Here's hoping your future holds nothing but greatness~!

2020000.name: Vogen
2020000.n0: If you have a set of raw ores of a mineral or a jewel, you should let me take care of the rest...
2020000.n1: I've been handling various ores for decades now...so long, that I can refine them with my eyes closed...

2020001.name: Scott
2020001.n0: You won't find these weapons anywhere else...haha
2020001.n1: Our weapon store only deals with the finest weapons around...

2020002.name: Gordon
2020002.n0: Hey, there! Your shoes look worn out...how about trying on MY pair of shoes?
2020002.n1: I have been making shoes in this town for over 50 years now...hahah

2020003.name: Master Sergeant Fox
2020003.n1: I need to find them fast...hey you! Can you help me out here?
2020003.d0: Because of an accident, all my men have been separated and spread out everywhere. I hope they're alright.
2020003.d1: Oh... thanks for locating all my men for me the other day. Have you ever run into any one of them since? If not, then you should go see them. They may ask you for some help.

2020004.name: Mr. Mohammed
2020004.n0: You need a place to store your items and mesos? Then you came to the right place.
2020004.n1: My storage is safe and secure, so no worries!

2020005.name: Alcaster
2020005.n0: Hmmm...another new set of datas...the more I work on it, the more it seems to never end...
2020005.n1: I found something very interesting, but it's not something I can work on just by myself...
2020005.d0: I'm Alcaster the sorcerer, and I've been working on various spells and magic here for over 300 years.
2020005.d1: Hey, how have you been? Thanks to you, I can now live out the remaining days of my life in peace. All I want to do now is just study things in life.

2020006.name: Jade
2020006.n0: An old friend of mine is suddenly nowhere to be found...I wonder how she's doing these days...
2020006.n1: I've been investigating around this town lately and found some very interesting facts in the process...
2020006.d0: I've been studying the geography of this island for a long time, and I still don't know a lot of things. I need more data. Anyway, I'm worried about this friend of mine in Orbis who disappeared out of the blue one day. I wonder what happened to her.
2020006.d1: I have no clue where Hella may be, or what she is doing, but I'm sure she's doing just fine there. I'll be here living just fine, waiting for the day when I see her again.

2020007.name: Scadur
2020007.n0: Hey, back in the day, I could have taken down someYetis' if I felt like it...
2020007.n1: The hunting hasn't been easy these days...those monsters out there got pretty ferocious...
2020007.d0: Monsters have been getting much more ferocious lately. It's gotten to the point where I am worried about getting killed out there. I used to go hunt down a number of Yeti's a day, but those days are now over. I'm old.
2020007.d1: Monsters have been getting much more ferocious lately. It's gotten to the point where I am worried about getting killed out there. I used to go hunt down a number of Yeti's a day, but those days are now over. I'm old.

2020008.name: Tylus
2020008.n0: Do you want to be a more powerful Warrior than you ever were?
2020008.n1: This is a sacred ground, so please try to stay calm.
2020008.d0: Only the strongest of the strong deserves to move up the ladder and make the job advancement.
2020008.d1: I can literally feel your strength exude through your body.

2020009.name: Robeira
2020009.n0: You'll need to see me in order to become the best Magician in the world.
2020009.d0: Only those that seek to further probe into the truth deserve to make the job advancement.
2020009.d1: I can feel your thirst for more truth just by looking at your eyes.

2020010.name: Rene
2020010.n0: The path of the Bowman is long and treacherous.
2020010.n1: Please be quiet so we can concentrate on our work here.
2020010.d0: Only those with the eyes that look through the truth deserve to make the job advancement.
2020010.d1: I can grasp what kind of truth you seek through those eyes of yours.

2020011.name: Arec
2020011.n0: You want to become a powerful Thief? Then you've come to the right person.
2020011.n1: Please try not to make any noise around here.
2020011.d0: Only the ones that seek to seek further into darkness deserve to make the job advancement.
2020011.d1: I can clearly see the darkness in you.

2020012.name: Spirit of Snow Statue
2020012.d0: A broken statue. Ice particles everywhere, and the only thing that remains is the remaining ice that hardly resembles the structure.
2020012.d1: A broken statue. This was restored before, but was broken once more by someone else.

2020013.name: Pedro
2020013.n0: If you are a Pirate who wants to gain amazing powers, come and see me.
2020013.n1: Please be quiet, this is a sacred place.
2020013.d0: Only those who put their hands into the deeper darkness are qualified for job advancement.
2020013.d1: I can see the darkness inside you.

2022000.name: Rumi
2022000.n0: I personally welcome you to El Nath...and for that, how about taking a look at some nice armors around here?
2022000.n1: Without armors, you may run into some trouble against the monsters...so take a look around them and see if you like any one of them.

2022001.name: Hana
2022001.n0: Hello I'm Hana, the master alchemist in this town. Go take a look around and see if you find anything you like.
2022001.n1: Welcome~! Whatever you may need for your journey, I have them all.

2022002.name: Barun
2022002.n0: I made these scrolls, so I can guarantee that these all work to perfection!
2022002.n1: Making scrolls is even easier than hunting down slimes.

2022003.name: Shammos
2022003.s1: There will be a time when... I'll get out of here... out of this darkness
2022003.d0: Hehe...I need to gather up the strength right now!

2022004.name: Tylus
2022004.s1: I knew I could count on someone like you.
2022004.n0: From Crimson Balrog to Lycanthrope ... I'm concerned about the fact that those monsters are getting more and more powerful by the day.
2022004.n1: I'm very much relieved to know that there are people willing to fight these monsters.

2030000.name: Jeff
2030000.n0: Don't even think about entering here...it's not some place where anyone can just waltz in...
2030000.n1: Only the strongest can enter here...if you want in, talk to me

2030001.name: Sergeant Bravo
2030001.n0: Where is this? Where's Master Sergeant Fox?
2030001.n1: Ahh...it's cold here...but I can't be stopped!!
2030001.d0: It's so cold around here! I'm #b#p2030001##k, member of the Alpha Platoon. We got on an accident in mid-flight and made an emergency landing here, but I can't find the others. I'm pretty confident that they're all okay, though.
2030001.d1: Did you get #b#t4031049##k to #b#p2020003##k? Do I need anything? Well, not for now. But come see me later, alright?

2030002.name: Corporal Easy
2030002.n0: Where did the Sergeant and Staff Sergeant go???
2030002.n1: Eh...?? I don't think this is where I was supposed to land...
2030002.d0: This is a strange place. It looks like an abandoned tower. Oh, I'm #b#p2030002##k, member of the Alpha Platoon. We got on an accident in mid-flight and made an emergency landing here, but I can't find the others. I'm pretty confident that they're all okay, though.
2030002.d1: This is a strange place. It looks like an abandoned tower. Oh, I'm #b#p2030002##k, member of the Alpha Platoon. We got on an accident in mid-flight and made an emergency landing here, but I can't find the others. I'm pretty confident that they're all okay, though.

2030008.name: Adobis
2030008.n0: This used to be a peaceful town ... until one day, monsters started popping out of everywhere.
2030008.n1: In the deepest part of the Zakum Dungeon rest the strongest of the foes.
2030008.n2: Does anyone want to try the Zakum Quest?

2030009.name: Glibber
2030009.n1: I have various items here for you. Go take a look.
2030009.n2: The items may not be upto par with the town, but feel free to look around.

2030010.name: Amon
2030010.n0: Talk to me if you want to drop out any time.
2030010.n1: It won't get any easier as you move on...

2030011.name: Ali
2030011.n0: The only way out is to talk to me.
2030011.n1: If you want out, then talk to me.

2030012.name: Huckle
2030012.n0: I've been in here for 30 years now...
2030012.n1: I'm working on gathering up the materials for some spells.
2030012.d0: It's been a while since I last saw a person here, a place far far away from humanity. I've been in need of help, and I'm glad to see you here.
2030012.d1: You're the one that helped me gather up samples of the monsters. Thanks to you the research has picked up steam, but honestly, I can use some more samples. If you see me by the time I run out of these samples, who knows, I may ask you for more.

2030013.name: Adobis
2030013.n0: To challenge Zakum, you'll need to form a Zakum Squad.
2030013.n1: Talk to me if you are willing to form a Zakum Squad.

2032000.n0: Spiruna tend to get overly aggressive at times...but once you get to know her, she is really a nice person at heart.
2032000.n1: I've been assisting Spiruna while working hard myself, but it hasn't been easy...
2032000.d0: I'm #bSpiruna#k's assistant. Please forgive me for not giving you my name. Spiruna has been busy working on a new, difficult spell, and so she's quite edgy right now. Unless it's an urgent matter, I suggest you leave her alone.
2032000.d1: I'm #bSpiruna#k's assistant. Please forgive me for not giving you my name. Spiruna has been busy working on a new, difficult spell, and so she's quite edgy right now. Unless it's an urgent matter, I suggest you leave her alone.

2032001.name: Spiruna
2032001.n0: I'm working on an important magic, so please don't bother me.
2032001.n1: Kids these days...they just barge into someone else's home as if it's nothing...
2032001.d0: I'm in the middle of a very important work here so please don't bother me and leave this place. I can't concentrate when a stranger is around.
2032001.d1: I'm in the middle of a very important work here so please don't bother me and leave this place. I can't concentrate when a stranger is around.

2032002.name: Aura
2032002.n0: Please gather up the ore of fire and the paper document. The more documents you have, the better it is.
2032002.n1: You'll need a special item to go into the inner part of Zakum.

2032003.name: Lira
2032003.n0: Apparently there is an unfathomably powerful monster inside Zakum.
2032003.n1: Wow, you definitely worked your way up here.

2040000.name: Mel
2040000.n0: You'll need to purchase the ticket in order to get on board to go to Orbis.
2040000.n1: If you want to check out the schedule, then talk to me.

2040001.name: Delv the Toy Soldier
2040001.n0: I can't let anyone and everyone in.
2040001.n1: It's my job to protect this place.
2040001.d0: I'm sorry, but I cannot let anyone inside this place. There's a monster that has invaded Ludibrium, and is currently hidden in this place. It's very dangerous here, so I advise you to leave this minute unless you're involved in this. Now, if you'll excuse me...
2040001.d1: You're the one that gathered up the #b#t4031093##k for me. I am still eating those every now and then. Oh, by the way, have you talked to #b#p2040002##k, the guy next to me?

2040002.name: Olson the Toy Soldier
2040002.n0: You'll need to find the ones that are different in shapes.
2040002.n1: This room is not available for the public.
2040002.d0: Thanks to the crack of dimension, a monster from other dimension entered this place, stole a very important item, and is currently hidden in this room. I don't know how strong the monster it is, but no one wants to enter this room. Hmmm... we need to locate this monster and kill it, and recover the important item. We are in trouble...
2040002.d1: You're the one that not only defeated the monster from the other dimension, but also helped us fix the Ludibrium Clocktower. I can't thank you enough for all your hard work. Thanks to you, everything is alright now. Hope you have a great time here at Ludibrium!

2040003.name: Assistant Cheng
2040003.n0: This castle possesses many hidden towers.
2040003.n1: Please try to be quiet once inside.
2040003.d0: Lately we've been experiencing the disapperance of mechanical parts here at the factory, and we have no idea who's been committing this dastardly act. The factory can't run if the parts keep disappearing.
2040003.d1: Aren't you the one that helped me find the lost #b#t4031092##k here at the Toy Factory? Thanks to you, this place is running smoothly these days.

2040004.name: Roly-Poly 1
2040004.n0: Ludibrium is SO enormous, I can't ever take a day off here.
2040004.n1: There are so many places that need some fixing.
2040004.d0: I used to work at the Toy Factory inside the Ludibrium Clocktower, but I've been sent here to fix the destroyed parts of Eos Tower. The number of monsters have steadily increased, though, making this job very difficult for myself and other Roly-Poly's.
2040004.d1: You're the one that took my picture the other day. Have you met up with all 10 of us Roly Poly's? And you gave those pictures to #b#p2040015##k, right? I think our manager will be relieved after seeing those pictures and concentrate on his work.

2040005.name: Roly-Poly 2
2040005.n0: Sigh ... hopefully I get done with work soon.
2040005.n1: I fix and fix and fix and still, the work never ends.
2040005.d0: I used to work at the Toy Factory inside the Ludibrium Clocktower, but I've been sent here to fix the destroyed parts of Eos Tower. The number of monsters have steadily increased, though, making this job very difficult for myself and other Roly-Poly's.
2040005.d1: You're the one that took my picture the other day. Have you met up with all 10 of us Roly Poly's? And you gave those pictures to #b#p2040015##k, right? I think our manager will be relieved after seeing those pictures and concentrate on his work.

2040006.name: Roly-Poly 3
2040006.n0: I'm in charge of fixing things here.
2040006.n1: It's dangerous around here, so stay away from me!
2040006.d0: I used to work at the Toy Factory inside the Ludibrium Clocktower, but I've been sent here to fix the destroyed parts of Eos Tower. The number of monsters have steadily increased, though, making this job very difficult for myself and other Roly-Poly's.
2040006.d1: You're the one that took my picture the other day. Have you met up with all 10 of us Roly Poly's? And you gave those pictures to #b#p2040015##k, right? I think our manager will be relieved after seeing those pictures and concentrate on his work.

2040007.name: Roly-Poly 4
2040007.n0: Fixing is hard, but it is worth doing.
2040007.n1: I'm sure other workers are also working hard, right?
2040007.d0: I used to work at the Toy Factory inside the Ludibrium Clocktower, but I've been sent here to fix the destroyed parts of Eos Tower. The number of monsters have steadily increased, though, making this job very difficult for myself and other Roly-Poly's.
2040007.d1: You're the one that took my picture the other day. Have you met up with all 10 of us Roly Poly's? And you gave those pictures to #b#p2040015##k, right? I think our manager will be relieved after seeing those pictures and concentrate on his work.

2040008.name: Roly-Poly 5
2040008.n1: This is nothing compared to the days of making the towers ourselves.
2040008.d0: I used to work at the Toy Factory inside the Ludibrium Clocktower, but I've been sent here to fix the destroyed parts of Eos Tower. The number of monsters have steadily increased, though, making this job very difficult for myself and other Roly-Poly's.
2040008.d1: You're the one that took my picture the other day. Have you met up with all 10 of us Roly Poly's? And you gave those pictures to #b#p2040015##k, right? I think our manager will be relieved after seeing those pictures and concentrate on his work.

2040009.name: Roly-Poly 6
2040009.n0: I've always longed to work at a huge tower like this.
2040009.n1: If you find any spot that needs some fixing, then let me know, okay?
2040009.d0: I used to work at the Toy Factory inside the Ludibrium Clocktower, but I've been sent here to fix the destroyed parts of Eos Tower. The number of monsters have steadily increased, though, making this job very difficult for myself and other Roly-Poly's.
2040009.d1: You're the one that took my picture the other day. Have you met up with all 10 of us Roly Poly's? And you gave those pictures to #b#p2040015##k, right? I think our manager will be relieved after seeing those pictures and concentrate on his work.

2040010.name: Roly-Poly 7
2040010.n0: My eyes? It's just an eye disease.
2040010.n1: It would be awesome if my daily commute isn't so long.
2040010.d0: I used to work at the Toy Factory inside the Ludibrium Clocktower, but I've been sent here to fix the destroyed parts of Eos Tower. The number of monsters have steadily increased, though, making this job very difficult for myself and other Roly-Poly's.
2040010.d1: You're the one that took my picture the other day. Have you met up with all 10 of us Roly Poly's? And you gave those pictures to #b#p2040015##k, right? I think our manager will be relieved after seeing those pictures and concentrate on his work.

2040011.name: Roly-Poly 8
2040011.n0: Oh my gosh, I'm tired. I think I'll rest for a second.
2040011.n1: I forgot to eat breakfast, so I'm hungry like no other right now.
2040011.d0: I used to work at the Toy Factory inside the Ludibrium Clocktower, but I've been sent here to fix the destroyed parts of Eos Tower. The number of monsters have steadily increased, though, making this job very difficult for myself and other Roly-Poly's.
2040011.d1: You're the one that took my picture the other day. Have you met up with all 10 of us Roly Poly's? And you gave those pictures to #b#p2040015##k, right? I think our manager will be relieved after seeing those pictures and concentrate on his work.

2040012.name: Roly-Poly 9
2040012.n0: I may be the youngest worker around, but I work my butt off everyday!
2040012.n1: Oh, that place has been fixed, so it's fine.
2040012.d0: I used to work at the Toy Factory inside the Ludibrium Clocktower, but I've been sent here to fix the destroyed parts of Eos Tower. The number of monsters have steadily increased, though, making this job very difficult for myself and other Roly-Poly's.
2040012.d1: You're the one that took my picture the other day. Have you met up with all 10 of us Roly Poly's? And you gave those pictures to #b#p2040015##k, right? I think our manager will be relieved after seeing those pictures and concentrate on his work.

2040013.name: Roly-Poly 10
2040013.n0: Am I working hard? Can't you tell just from looking?
2040013.n1: I want to get this done with and go home...!!
2040013.d0: I used to work at the Toy Factory inside the Ludibrium Clocktower, but I've been sent here to fix the destroyed parts of Eos Tower. The number of monsters have steadily increased, though, making this job very difficult for myself and other Roly-Poly's.
2040013.d1: You're the one that took my picture the other day. Have you met up with all 10 of us Roly Poly's? And you gave those pictures to #b#p2040015##k, right? I think our manager will be relieved after seeing those pictures and concentrate on his work.

2040014.name: Chico
2040014.n0: If you want to know anything about minigames, then talk to me.
2040014.n1: You may try hard, but you'll never, ever beat me.

2040015.name: Manager Karl
2040015.n0: Those workers ...  are they working hard even when I'm not around?
2040015.n1: Oh no, I forgot to bring my lunchbox to work today...
2040015.n2: I'm #p2040015# for this place. There are many dangerous machines around, so please be careful.
2040015.d0: Helow there! I'm #b#p2040015##k, the one in charge of the Toy Factory. Today's another one of those busy days...
2040015.d1: Oh~ You're the one that met up with our Roly Poly's at the Eos Tower for me! How can I help you here? Huh? Haha, of course, I did not forget the lunch box my daughter made for me. I'm just waiting for lunch so I can eat them! I'll see you around!

2040016.name: Pi
2040016.n0: Don't you want to make something? It's a piece of cake for me~
2040016.n1: Hmmm ... you can gather up some really fine materials here at Ludibrium.

2040017.name: Green Mesoranger
2040017.n0: As long as we're here, everything will be fine!
2040017.d0: I'm here taking care of a very important mission given to me by the Omega Sector. It is very dangerous around here, so I suggest you run right now.
2040017.d1: The Roswell Field is prone to aliens making apperances, so this place is under special constant watch. The attack is still on, so I suggest you and others not to get too comfortable in this place. I'll have to head back to the Sector for some more work, so I'll see you around!

2040018.name: Black Mesoranger
2040018.n0: Pink Mesoranger is ALWAYS late ... we can't be at our 100% strength unless all 5 of us are here.
2040018.n1: Nothing scares us when all 5 of us are here!
2040018.d0: Hello! I'm #b#p2040018##k, in charge of a mission to prevent the aliens from invading this place. It seems like they have been acting up more lately. It's very dangerous around here, so I suggest you run back to the Omega Sector for safety.
2040018.d1: You're the one that helped me get rid of #b#o4230116##k here at the Coolan Field. It feels good to find someone like you here at a place where dangerous aliens are a common sight. I'm still investigating on the mastermind behind these aliens. I'm going up against yet another alien, so it's not easy...

2040019.name: Everton
2040019.n0: Welcome to our hospital! Your face looks terrrrrible. Need my help?
2040019.n1: Every once in a while comes a person whose face is a little hard to touch. You happen to be that person, haha... how do you want it?

2040020.name: Sarah
2040020.n0: It is easy to make gloves~
2040020.n1: I have a special glove for you... You want to take a look?

2040021.name: Tara
2040021.n0: People are looking for my shoes in these days.
2040021.n1: Have you ever heard about stimulator? With this... haha... yeah...

2040022.name: Rydole
2040022.n0: Do you want to make a weapon? This is the perfect place.
2040022.n1: You need to have manuals to make weapons

2040023.name: Lost Soldier
2040023.d0: Eos Tower is humongous ... so big that we have gotten ourselves lost in this place every once in a while.
2040023.d1: Hmmm ... where am I?? I'm in charge of security for the 59th floor of Eos Tower, but I have nooo idea where I am at right this minute. Hmmm ...

2040028.name: Mark the Toy Soldier
2040028.n0: Please find the dollhouse that looks different from the others.
2040028.n1: If you wish to leave this place, then talk to me.

2040029.name: Grandpa Clock
2040029.n0: What can I do for you today? It's dangerous around here, so I suggest you move to a safe place nearby?
2040029.d0: I'm #b#p2040029##k, and I've been sent here to see what's wrong with the Ludibrium Clocktower, but I can't seem to find any errors in this.
2040029.d1: You must have told #b#p2040002##k the Clocktower has been fixed. Hopefully the soldiers can trust the time now. Thank you so much for your hard work. I'll have to get back to work now. Please head back to Ludibrium, as this place is too dangerous a place to just hang out.

2040030.name: Wisp
2040030.n1: I'm Wisp, continuing on with the studies that my master Mar the Fairy assigned me.

2040032.name: Weaver
2040032.n0: Do you want to train your pet? Then you've come to the right place.
2040032.n1: Raising pets can be a tough task at times.

2040033.name: Neru
2040033.n0: My brother and I majored in pet training.
2040033.n1: The more you train your pet, the closer you two will become.

2040034.name: Red Sign
2040034.n0: You may not go higher than where you are right now.

2040035.name: Arturo
2040035.f0: Your accomplishments will be remembered forever.
2040035.f1: I had no doubt in my mind that you'd succeed.
2040035.f2: It must have been a dangerous situation for you... how did you manage to beat it?

2040036.name: Red Balloon
2040036.n0: I can help you out on many levels.

2040037.name: Orange Balloon
2040037.n0: I can help you out on many levels.

2040038.name: Yellow Balloon
2040038.n0: I can help you out on many levels.

2040039.name: Lime Balloon
2040039.n0: I can help you out on many levels.

2040040.name: Green Balloon
2040040.n0: I can help you out on many levels.

2040041.name: Aqua Balloon
2040041.n0: I can help you out on many levels.

2040042.name: Sky-Blue Balloon
2040042.n0: I can help you out on many levels.

2040043.name: Blue Balloon
2040043.n0: I can help you out on many levels.

2040044.name: Violet Balloon
2040044.n0: I can help you out on many levels.

2040045.name: Pink Balloon
2040045.n0: I can help you out on many levels.

2040046.name: Robert Holly
2040046.n0: Hey, you there! You look like you have a lot of friends. Do you need help?
2040046.n1: If your buddy list is full, then come see me.

2040047.name: Sgt. Anderson
2040047.n0: Please take care of Alishar the gatekeeper of this world.
2040047.n1: I'll take you to the path that'll lead you to the 101st floor of the Eos Tower.
2040047.n2: Please don't tell me you're giving up already.

2040048.name: Nara
2040048.n0: How about taking a ride to the most exotic island in MapleStory, the Florina Beach?
2040048.n1: Do you have the power ticket by any chance? Then you should get on the ride and enjoy the fun.
2040048.d0: Don't you want to head off to Florina Beach?
2040048.d1: You look tired and exhausted. How about spending some relaxing time at Florina Beach?

2040050.name: Eurek the Alchemist
2040050.s0: With a few materials, you can make summoning rocks and magic rocks
2040050.d0: Hello there. I'm Eurek the Alchemist, wandering around places all over the world of MapleStory. I'm here just to stop by for a bit.

2040051.name: Toly
2040051.s0: This is what you call the best medicine one can ever make!
2040051.s1: You can recover quickly, or can temporarily move to avoid yourself from the chips.
2040051.a1: Check out this place; this place is cool
2040051.s3: I made this myself, so there just aren't many left. You should buy them now before it gets too late.

2040052.name: Wiz the Librarian
2040052.n0: This library isn't full of old, boring books. We also have books full of great animated books...or so we used to...
2040052.n1: I'd love to find the lost books ASAP.
2040052.d0: Oh no, the books are all mixed up.
2040052.d1: This library is finally beginning to resemble that of a normal library.

2041000.name: Tian
2041000.n0: If you want to get on board to the ship that heads to Orbis, then please hand me the ticket.
2041000.n1: There's a limited capacity on this trip, so please get on board now! We're about to take off!
2041000.n2: Please be aware that if you go into the Cash Shop while on board, you'll be sent back to Ludibrium.

2041001.name: Rosey
2041001.n0: Can I help you with anything? Enjoy your trip~
2041001.n1: Anyone that wants to leave the ship and head back to the original spot, talk to me.
2041001.n2: Please be aware that if you go into the Cash Shop while on board, you'll be sent back to where you were before.

2041002.name: Hid
2041002.n0: There are places in Ludibrium where the monsters pop out of nowhere.
2041002.n1: We have a weapon JUST FOR YOU!

2041003.name: Miru
2041003.n0: Welcome! Look around, see what you like.
2041003.n1: A tough armor is necessary, for the monsters may pop up anywhere inside the castle.

2041004.name: Marcel
2041004.n0: Make sure you don't get lost inside the castle.
2041004.d0: Hello, there! I'm #b#p2041004##k, in charge of the security for Ludibrium. Lately there have been some filthy creatures dirtying up Eos Tower, and I don't like it one bit.
2041004.d1: Hey! You're the one that cleaned out the Eos Tower for me last time! How have you been? I'm so glad the number of monsters have generally decreased, and they aren't as wild as they were before. I really appreciate all your hard work. Oh well, hope you have a great day at Ludibrium!

2041005.name: Nemi
2041005.n1: Isn't it beautiful today? I would like nothing more than just go somewhere...
2041005.d0: Oh, hi! I don't think I've met you before... have you been traveling around? I'm #b#p2041005##k, residing here in Ludibrium, and my father is the manager of the Toy Factory. If you have time, you should go see that place.
2041005.d1: Hello~! Thanks to you, my dad got his appetite back. He really enjoys it. How can I help you today? Oh no!!! You shouldn't enter this place with your shoes on! I cleaned up this place just now, you know!!! If you don't have much else to do, then please come back some other time!

2041006.name: Misky
2041006.n0: We sell stuff that you can't find anywhere else!
2041006.n1: Need potions or some food? You've come to the right place.
2041006.a0: You!! You aren't jacking anything from here, right?
2041006.a1: Touch anything here, and I'll be very very angry with you!
2041006.g0: It's tougher than you think, making new potions
2041006.g1: Hah! Just making new potions here ...

2041007.name: Miyu
2041007.n0: Oh my, you still have that hairdo? That's sooo yesterday ...
2041007.n1: If you want to try a different hair style, then just talk to me!

2041008.name: Seppy
2041008.n0: Looking for a place to store your mesos or items? Then look no further!
2041008.n1: Our storage is safe as a lock, so feel free to leave your stuff here!

2041009.name: Mini
2041009.n0: Welcome to our hair salon! I may be still in training, but how about letting me do your hair?
2041009.n1: It's a tough act being a hair stylist...

2041010.name: Ellie
2041010.n0: Wanna change your face into something ... much more beautiful?
2041010.n1: You look fine now, but with a little touch here and there, you'll look FANTABULOUS

2041011.name: Yellow Mesoranger
2041011.n0: Worried about monsters? Let us handle them!
2041011.n1: It's our job to protect everyone here!
2041011.d0: Hi. I'm #b#p2041011##k, in charge of a special mission here. Have you seen an alien around here? Apparently they attract innocent strangers by sweet-talking to them, so please be aware of that.
2041011.d1: Hi. I'm #b#p2041011##k, in charge of a special mission here. Have you seen an alien around here? Apparently they attract innocent strangers by sweet-talking to them, so please be aware of that.

2041012.name: Pink Mesoranger
2041012.n0: It's so hard to wake up early each morning. I should stop being late ...
2041012.n1: I'm more than happy to protect you all, except for the fact that I sleep waaay too much...
2041012.d0: Hello, there. I'm #b#p2041012##k of Omega Sector, currently in a secret mission to prevent the alien invasion here. I've been really busy these days taking care of important missions. This place is very dangerous, so I suggest you get out of here and go to a safer place.
2041012.d1: You're back~ I've been getting up on time these days, and I'm never late on missions. I'm also glad the people upstairs are taking notice. It's all thanks to you. Now, I have something important to do, so please excuse me~

2041013.name: Gina
2041013.n0: You want to have a slim & sexy body like me? I will make your skin beautiful~
2041013.n1: Wow... you must be traveling all around... your skin got damaged a lot...

2041014.name: Patricia
2041014.n0: Are you looking for the pet food?
2041014.n1: Aren't your pets hungry? I got some food for them~

2041015.name: Korin
2041015.f0: I feel like I've witnessed something incredible.
2041015.f1: ...I don't remember...the last few months...that I've been...missing...
2041015.f2: I've been trying to remember things, but it's hard.
2041015.f3: Did something terrible happen to me?
2041015.w0: Whenever I think about that day ... I get swept with fear, and tears would just come out.
2041015.w1: Please ... someone help me regain my lost memory.
2041015.d0: Hmmm...? I don't think we've ever met. What are you doing at my house? If you don't have anything to talk about, then please leave.
2041015.d1: You're the one that helped me find my lost memories. I can't thank you enough for your effort. I've been trying to live a normal life these days.

2041016.name: Vega
2041016.n0: I admit, I have failed in making scrolls every once in a while, but that's few and far between!
2041016.n1: I've made my share of mistakes making these scrolls, but don't worry, I'm good at this!

2041017.name: Ace of Hearts
2041017.n0: A sweet chocolate can go a long way towards helping you say I LOVE YOU!
2041017.n1: I, Mr. Ace of Hearts, will let you in on a secret recipe to a sweet chocolate of love ~
2041017.d0: I am here to bake lovely goods for everyone needing my service! Doesn't it smell good around here? Mmmm Hmmm!
2041017.d1: I can only make so much of it by myself. Please bear with me, for I can only make one per hour for you.

2041018.name: Hans the Assembler
2041018.f0: I am the best when it comes to assembling toys here at the Toy Factory.
2041018.f1: Gather up the materials I ask of you, and I'll make something nice for you in return~
2041018.d0: I just need few things to make a fun toy to play around with...but I don't know if I'm even allowed to make this.
2041018.d1: Hey, what's going on? Have you tried using the stuff I gave you the other day? That item had some experimental elements to it, and therefore a little dangerous, but it was fun making something I've always wanted to make. I have to get back to work now!

2041019.name: Rocky the Repairman
2041019.n0: Why does this keep breaking down?
2041019.d0: It's broken again...and I just fixed this not too long ago! Who did this?! If only I can get my hands on whoever that's responsible for this...ARRGH!!!
2041019.d1: Oh no, it must be the monsters again. As soon as I fix this, they come rushing back and break things again. Oh hey, how long have you been there? Thanks to the parts you got me, I've been fixing machines here and there, but they seem to break every other day, so I have no time to rest. I gotta go! Bye!

2041020.name: Mac the Mechanic
2041020.n0: These machines should be taken care of on a daily basis...
2041020.d0: Great weather today. I'm #b#p2041020##k, working here at the Toy Factory. I'm in charge of making blueprints for the machines around here, as well as fixing them if necessary.
2041020.d1: You're back. I've been busy here working thanks to the documents you got me. Oh, and this time, I hid it in a safe just in a case. I have to get back to work now. See you around!

2041021.name: Mr. Bouffon
2041021.n0: We need to find the source of power for the time sphere which is at the center of Ludibrium.
2041021.n1: We need an energy replacement for the time sphere. Please gather up Tachions.
2041021.s0: It is important to seal up the cracked dimension in order to prevent it from running away.
2041021.s1: If you break the time sphere, you'll see the source of all evil face to face!!!
2041021.d0: I'm Mr. Bouffon, in charge of protecting the Path of Time.
2041021.d1: Thanks to you the root of all evil in Ludibrium is gone forever! Only the peaceful days shall lay ahead.

2041022.name: Tigun the Advisor
2041022.s0: Are you the one delivering the history book? Let's see...
2041022.d0: I, Tigun the Advisor, am responsible for helping the King of Ludibrium run this place as smooth as possible... hmmm...
2041022.d1: Aren't you the honorable traveler? Did you meet with #t1012109#? You remind me of my own traveling days...I was one fearless kid back then...

2041023.name: Flo
2041023.d0: I'm Flo, in charge of protecting the Path of Time. Would you like to see me work my magic?
2041023.d1: Showtime!! Am I good or what?

2041026.name: Ghosthunter Bob
2041026.s0: When was the last time I had a decent meal? Urgh urgh
2041026.t0: Hey who do you think you are, roaming around this place that easily?
2041026.d1: I feel a negative vibe around here...

2041027.name: Mason the Collector
2041027.m0: Look, but don't touch! Precious items here!
2041027.m1: I need to collect, collect, and collect...
2041027.d0: I want this, this, this, and that...

2041028.name: Unknown Thief
2041028.n0: If you want something, you'll need to pay a price for it.
2041028.n1: Do you want something from me?
2041028.d0: I can't believe I'm here doing chores like this. I understand it's an order, but that doesn't make this any easier to do.
2041028.d1: For Hellin to look out for someone like you... it is indeed quite surprising. Well, I'm sure it's not all that fun to be paid attention to. He's quite ruthless, to say the least.

2041029.name: Karen
2041029.n0: This is the time control room for Ludibrium. Only the proper personnel may enter this place.
2041029.n1: I can't believe the security device for the time controller is broken. What should I do...?
2041029.d0: Oh no, someone destroyed the security device for the time controller!!
2041029.d1: Ahhh... I can't believe you just skipped time like that. The goddess will not forgive you for it.

2042000.name: Spiegelmann
2042000.n0: If you're an adventurer looking for challenge, participate in the Monster Carnival!
2042000.n1: Aren't you curious to see who the strongest adventurer is amongst your friends?

2042001.name: Spiegelmann
2042001.n0: If you're an adventurer looking for challenge, participate in the Monster Carnival!
2042001.n1: Aren't you curious to see who the strongest adventurer is amongst your friends?

2042002.name: Spiegelmann
2042002.n0: If you're an adventurer looking for challenge, participate in the Monster Carnival!
2042002.n1: Aren't you curious to see who the strongest adventurer is amongst your friends?

2042003.name: Assistant Red
2042003.n0: All of you will exit this place as soon as you talk to me.

2042004.name: Assistant Blue
2042004.n0: All of you will exit this place as soon as you talk to me.

2042005.name: Spiegelmann
2042005.n0: If you're an adventurer looking for challenge, participate in the Monster Carnival!
2042005.n1: Aren't you curious to see who the strongest adventurer is amongst your friends?

2042006.name: Spiegelmann
2042006.n0: If you're an adventurer looking for challenge, participate in the Monster Carnival!
2042006.n1: Aren't you curious to see who the strongest adventurer is amongst your friends?

2042007.name: Spiegelmann
2042007.n0: If you're an adventurer looking for challenge, participate in the Monster Carnival!
2042007.n1: Aren't you curious to see who the strongest adventurer is amongst your friends?

2042008.name: Assistant Red
2042008.n0: All of you will exit this place as soon as you talk to me.

2042009.name: Assistant Blue
2042009.n0: All of you will exit this place as soon as you talk to me.

2043000.name: Papulatus
2043000.n0: The crack of dimension... when will the experiment end?
2043000.n1: If only I can warp the time...

2050000.name: Dr. San
2050000.n0: I have lots of weapons for you. Pick one~
2050000.n1: It is so hard to find the materials for the weapon in these days. There are just too many monsters.

2050001.name: Dr. Kim
2050001.n0: We need to get going soon, but where is everyone?
2050001.n1: hmm... You guys are not strong enough to fight against aliens, yet...
2050001.d0: Ohh... the greatest masterpiece of all time, by me! With this blueprint, I can make the most indestructable robot ever!
2050001.d1: Hmmm... the fuel's fine, the parts are fine ... and, by debugging this critical error of the Alpha system ... huh? Can I help you? I'm busy developing new machines, so unless you need me for something, talk to someone else. I need to get back to work now.

2050002.name: Alien Gray
2050002.n0: My name is Gray from the space...
2050002.n1: I want to be a friend with you
2050002.d0: The Omega Sector is busy attacking innocent aliens again ... it's just unfortunate ...
2050002.d1: Hahaha, you fool. The critical document you gave me is currently in the process of deciphering. Omega Sector has been impossible to attack because of their tight security, but I'm sure the deciphering will be done soon. I don't need you anymore, so get away from me!

2050003.name: Spacen
2050003.n0: We have lots of excellent armors in Omega Sceptor
2050003.n1: You must have good armors to fight against aliens

2050004.name: Kubo the Storageman
2050004.n0: Are you looking for the storage place?
2050004.n1: My storage is totally safe~! I guarantee you...

2050005.name: Chury
2050005.n0: Tsk, Tsk... I'll be late if I don't get going!
2050005.n1: As long as I am here, this place is safe!!!
2050005.d0: Sigh ... This is the first time I'm resting in a long time. I've been up the past few days on missions. The aliens always make noise after dark... anyway, it's the first break I've had in a while, so I need to enjoy this as much as I can. But then again, I should still be aware on guard...
2050005.d1: You're the one that brought #b#p2050001#'s#k #b#t4031100##k here and showed it to me. I can't thank you enough for that. How's the robot coming along? I can't wait for the day I get to have my hands on that robot. Now, I need to finish the training, so please excuse me

2050006.name: Hoony
2050006.n1: I'm getting tired of going on missions every day.
2050006.d0: I'm #b#p2050006##k from the Omega Sector, currently on a secret mission. You look like a traveler, and eventhough you seem to be on our side, I can't divulge any information regarding this mission.
2050006.d1: You're the one that brought #b#p2050001#'s#k #b#t4031100##k here and showed it to me. I can't thank you enough for that. How's the robot coming along? I can't wait for the day I get to have my hands on that robot. Now I need to get back to work...

2050007.name: Gunny
2050007.n1: We need to have female pilots
2050007.d0: I'm #b#p2050007##k from the Omega Sector, currently on a secret mission. You look like a traveler, and eventhough you seem to be on our side, I can't divulge any information regarding this mission.
2050007.d1: You're the one that brought #b#p2050001#'s#k #b#t4031100##k here and showed it to me. I can't thank you enough for that. How's the robot coming along? I can't wait for the day I get to have my hands on that robot. Now I need to get back to work...

2050008.name: General Maestro
2050008.n0: My army is here to protect this place, yesterday, today and tomorrow.
2050008.n1: I have no time to talk, for I am in the middle of an important operation.
2050008.d0: Thanks for coming to the Omega Sector. Please stay on your toes, because the aliens may attack any minute. Oh, by the way, someone in the Sector needs your help. If you're interested, go see that person.
2050008.d1: The weather is just perfect outside. This place is full of security, protecting itself from the aliens. It's been awfully quiet these past few days, which troubles me, but I can't stand pat. Oh, by the way, the work you did for me the other day, that's going great now.

2050009.name: Jr. Officer Medin
2050009.n0: I'm in charge of protecting the general as well as directing the army.
2050009.n1: I am not going to tolerate anyone slacking off!

2050010.name: Rice the Medic
2050010.n0: I've studied a lot, but I don't have the real working experience yet.
2050010.n1: The red medicine should take care of most injuries.
2050010.d0: Please be careful of your every act here in Omega Sector. How can I help you? My name is #b#p2050010##k, and as you can see, I take care of the wounded here. I'm always on my toes here, in case aliens attacked.
2050010.d1: Please be careful of your every act here in Omega Sector. How can I help you? My name is #b#p2050010##k, and as you can see, I take care of the wounded here. I'm always on my toes here, in case aliens attacked.

2050011.name: Kevin the Soldier
2050011.n0: I heard that it's full of aliens outside... I wish I could go there and fight them too.
2050011.n1: Jr. Officer Medin is famous for being so strict.
2050011.d0: Sigh. I wish I could go outside and defeat the aliens myself, but the only work I am getting is restricted to here at the headquarters. I am confident that I can do a good job too. When can I go out and combat them...?
2050011.d1: Sigh. I wish I could go outside and defeat the aliens myself, but the only work I am getting is restricted to here at the headquarters. I am confident that I can do a good job too. When can I go out and combat them...?

2050012.name: Agent M
2050012.n0: Hey... Have you seen an alien before?
2050012.n1: Please don't tell anyone that you met me.
2050012.d0: Shh...!  It's probably best if you act like you don't know me here.  Although our headquarters is the safest place, it's also the most threatened place at the same time.  If you don't have a particular reason to see me, please walk away.  Good bye...
2050012.d1: Hmm...  #b#p2041015##k seems to have retrieved her lost memories.  Tell her to be careful not to be abducted by aliens again.  If there isn't anything else, you can leave now.

2050013.name: Porter
2050013.n0: I'm Porter, a researcher here at Omega Sector.
2050013.n1: I have so much to research, I don't even have time to sleep.
2050013.d0: Hello, there. My name is #b#p2050013##k, and I work here at the headquarters helping #b#p2050001##k out develop a new robot. (sniff) The new robot is coming out nicely, but I have been suffering from cold for a while. (sniff) Now, if you'll excuse me, I'll have to get back to work. I can't be caught slacking off, you know...
2050013.d1: Hello, there. My name is #b#p2050013##k, and I work here at the headquarters helping #b#p2050001##k out develop a new robot. (sniff) The new robot is coming out nicely, but I have been suffering from cold for a while. (sniff) Now, if you'll excuse me, I'll have to get back to work. I can't be caught slacking off, you know...

2051000.name: Dr. Pepper
2051000.n0: I hope these potions can help you out here
2051000.n1: My potion is excellent! Completely different from other potions~!

2051001.name: Kay
2051001.n0: The Omega Sector contains many important mechanical parts.
2051001.n1: My job is to maintain these machines.
2051001.d0: Hi! I'm the head engineer of the Omega Sector, #b#p2051001##k. I don't have too much work with me, but I'm really busy because I don't have any assistants here with me.
2051001.d1: You're back again. Thanks for investigating the transporter last time. I still have no idea what happened to the pilot, but ... at least we found a letter that he wrote, so that'll do for now. Hopefully he's doing fine somewhere in the world, just the way he said it in the letter.

2060000.name: Nanuke
2060000.m0: I feel safe going around with my friends
2060000.d1: Long time! Are you here to check out the huskies? Then you've come to the right place!

2060001.name: Robinson
2060001.s0: I just want to return to where I was before... where exactly am I?
2060001.s1: How did you get here? Is the ocean safe? I can't believe it...
2060001.d0: How long have I been here in this island? I don't even know the date now.
2060001.d1: I better get out of this island now and return to the headquarters.

2060002.name: Tae Gong
2060002.s0: Hahaha... how can I say that I only go fishing here...
2060002.s1: Fishing brings serenity into my life...
2060002.d0: When I'm out fishing, the only thing I notice is the ocean and the time that passes by.
2060002.d1: I just can't seem to fish today. In fact, I don't have any with me right now. My wife may be very disappointed by this...

2060003.name: Melias
2060003.s0: I think you need some armors to protect yourself from possible danger...
2060003.s1: Check out the stuff I'm selling here!

2060004.name: Oannes
2060004.s0: You won't find a more effective potion than the one I make here!
2060004.s1: I only make them using the finest corals and seaweeds you can find here at the Aquaroad!

2060005.name: Kenta
2060005.s1: You can only see these animals on land. Please don't get them riled up!

2060006.name: Muse
2060006.s0: Please don't feed the animals at the zoo!
2060006.s1: Have fun here at the zoo~!
2060006.d0: Welcome to the Aquarium Zoo~ I'm Muse, your guide to the zoo!
2060006.d1: I really miss my boyfriend at times... I wonder how he's doing these days...

2060007.name: Calypso
2060007.s0: I have some nice weapons. Come take a look!
2060007.s1: I put a lot of effort into these weapons, and you'll see what I mean the moment you use them.

2060008.name: Gerrard
2060008.s0: Do you need to place your items and mesos somewhere safe? Then come to me!
2060008.s1: Our storage is the safest you can find in this town! No need to worry one bit!

2060010.name: Dolphin
2060010.n0: This place is creepy. Shouldn't we go back now?

2060100.name: Carta
2060100.s0: Would you like to find out what your future holds?
2060100.s1: This most certainly isn't for free...
2060100.d0: You must be a fool to come all the way down here ... what do you want from me?
2060100.d1: It's foolish for anyone to want to look into the future...

2060101.name: Taeng the Explorer
2060101.s0: Some strange things have been happening here lately.
2060101.s1: Hopefully all of the men that have gone to the bottom of the ocean return safely.
2060101.d0: I need to investigate whatever is going on deep in the ocean.
2060101.d1: Please be careful, for you'll run into a lot of sharks outside. You need to be on your toes at all times.

2060103.name: Norrington
2060103.n0: I feel a mysterious current of air blowing.
2060103.n1: Their spirits must still be lingering here.

2070000.name: Mr. Noh
2070000.s0: Don't worry about your stuff being kept here. I have everything here on record.
2070000.s1: Hmm...hmm what was I writing by the way?

2070001.name: Bung's Mama
2070001.n0: Do you need anything, there? I've got some goods you may be interested in~
2070001.n1: We have potions and other goods here, so come take a look~

2070002.name: Moki
2070002.n0: Hohoho... I guarantee these items are tough as a raging Goblin!
2070002.n1: Hohoho, dinner should be ready by now...

2070003.name: Dori
2070003.n0: Come take a look at these! These armors have been made through the 100+ years of knowledge passed down from generation to generation!
2070003.n1: Hey hey, look but don't touch! You're devaluing these items by touching them!

2071000.name: Chumji
2071000.n0: Hohoho, Goblins are easy to spot around this area...
2071000.n1: Hmmm, those Goblins concern me a great deal. They were definitely pranksters, but they never caused any harm to these people. Not until now...
2071000.d0: Hohoho, welcome~ Welcome to this great town~
2071000.d1: Have you acquainted yourself with the people here? Feel free to stay here for a while~

2071001.name: Hongbu
2071001.n0: Heh... interesting, I always feel hungry...
2071001.n1: Isn't my brother a little scary? It doesn't matter, though, because he's still in my family~
2071001.d0: Heh... I'm starving ... I need to find a way to put food on the table...
2071001.d1: I need to remind myself to stay frugal and save at all cost.

2071002.name: Nolbu
2071002.n0: Hmmm, what do you want from me?
2071002.n1: Hongbu keeps coming by asking me for something... man, I am getting stressed out. By the way, are YOU here through Hongbu?
2071002.d0: If you are here to ask for a favor, then don't waste your time and leave now.
2071002.d1: Hmmm, I don't feel like talking to you!

2071003.name: Chil Nam
2071003.n0: I am very much worried about my brother. He worries about me too much that I'm afraid he might not be taking care of himself...
2071003.n1: Being my brother is a tall order, what with taking care of my parents and all...
2071003.d1: I wonder how my brother's doing these days... I hope he isn't sick

2071004.name: Kong Ji
2071004.n0: Oh no, I need to finish this before my stepmother gets here...
2071004.n1: My goodness, this is neverending. I hope someone can help me out...
2071004.d0: Did you see my stepmother on your way here, by any chance? Oh no... I haven't finished my work, yet...
2071004.d1: Hey there, thanks for your help last time~ =)

2071005.name: Chil Sung
2071005.n0: I wonder how my brother Chill Nam is doing. I'm worried.
2071005.n1: My brother only started living away a couple of months ago, and I'm not sure if he's having fun there...
2071005.d0: Oh, you must be from abroad... nice to meet you~
2071005.d1: I hope my brother Chill Nam is staying strong.

2071006.name: Swallow
2071006.n0: I need to get back down South before the cold winter arrives, but my wings... my wings...
2071006.n1: Ummm ... do my wings look alright? Do you think I can fly with these?
2071006.d0: I should have been more careful. Look at my wing... do you think these will heal up in time before the winter comes?
2071006.d1: I need my wings to heal up so I can fly down South in time to avoid the cold weather here.

2071007.name: Grandma Yeon
2071007.n0: This pot is created by me to make sure no food gets spoiled in here~
2071007.n1: My husband is always outside fishing while meditating.
2071007.d0: My husband went down to the coast to go fishing...I hope he's doing alright~
2071007.d1: If you are looking for a good pot, I'll be right here~

2071008.name: Haenim
2071008.s0: Just thinking about last night creeps me out...
2071008.s1: Is there anyone out there willing to help out my sister and I?
2071008.d0: My name is Haenim. I live with my mom and my little sister.
2071008.d1: I better get ready before the bad tiger shows up. I'm sure as long as I keep myself on my toes, I'll be able to defeat the big bad tiger.

2071009.name: Mr. Shim
2071009.n0: No matter what, in this town, my daughter Shim Chung is the most beautiful one.
2071009.n1: Has anyone seen Shim Chung, though...?
2071009.d0: My eyes have been failing me these days...
2071009.d1: I can see much better with the glasses on.

2071010.name: God of Mountains
2071010.n0: Is this gold axe yours? Or is it this silver axe?
2071010.n1: I'm the god of this region, I'm also the god of this Black Mountain.
2071010.d0: I can't believe someone would actually turn down a gold axe AND a silver axe...
2071010.d1: Have you returned the steel axe to the axeman?

2071011.name: Tree Cutter
2071011.n0: Please find the steel axe for me...
2071011.n1: I need the metal axe in order to go chop some wood...
2071011.d0: Did you bring back the steel axe that has my name on it?
2071011.d1: Thank you so much for finding my steel axe!

2071013.name: Yellow King Goblin
2071013.n0: The Black Mountain is so dangerous these days that I can't even walk there at night.
2071013.n1: What if the Nona-Tailed Fox gets here?
2071013.d0: Hmmm... I'm hungry... should I just eat a human tonight?

2071014.name: Blue King Goblin
2071014.n0: I can't sleep because of those darn foxes!
2071014.n1: Even the god of Black Mountain got attacked or something...
2071014.d0: Hmm hmmm! I think there are way too many reckless humans out there today!
2071014.d1: Should I drink some tea right now?

2071015.name: Green King Goblin
2071015.n0: The Black Mountain isn't what it used to be...
2071015.d0: Should I go to the Tiger Ridge, or the Moon Ridge? Is there anyone that's good at wrestling?
2071015.d1: I should have asked for more Buckwheat Paste...

2072000.name: Chil Sung's Rice Stacks
2072000.d0: These are Chil Sung's Rice Stacks.
2072000.d1: These are Chil Sung's Rice Stacks.

2072001.name: Chil Nam's Rice Stacks
2072001.d0: These are Chil Nam's Rice Stacks.
2072001.d1: These are Chil Nam's Rice Stacks.

2073000.name: Park Chum Ji
2073000.n1: Be careful not to be caught by Hogul. If you are caught by Hogul, you will be expelled.~

2080000.name: Mos
2080000.s0: I'm a master at upgrading weapons. Let me upgrade yours, too!
2080000.s1: In order to create a powerful weapon, I'll need various materials to work with.

2080001.name: Sly
2080001.s0: If you're looking for something important, I have it here!
2080001.s1: Potions are of neccesity to the travelers venturing through dangerous areas.

2080002.name: Max
2080002.s0: There's no weapon that beats a truly great armor when protecting the peace of this great land.
2080002.s1: These armors are here to protect you from harm.

2080003.name: Norman
2080003.s0: Scrolls are important if you want an extra boost on your equipment.
2080003.s1: It won't cost you a dime to look at them; just be careful with them!.

2080004.name: Moodie
2080004.s0: Ah... so your pet is hungry? Well, then look no further.
2080004.s1: I have everything here that your pet will need. Take a look.

2080005.name: Koscu
2080005.s0: Hah hah... Koscu will take care your items and mesos.
2080005.s1: Trust Koscu, hah hah. There's nothing to worry.

2080006.name: Dolphin
2080006.n0: I'm the fastest & the safest option to reach Aquarium.

2081000.name: Chief Tatamo
2081000.s0: We Hafrings prefer peace and love. Haha...
2081000.s1: My beard isn't for you to be messing with... haha...
2081000.d0: Are you still curious about something? Haha...
2081000.d1: Haha...I am always grateful for what you've done.

2081001.name: Kumo
2081001.s0: The egg may hatch any minute now.
2081001.s1: Kumo's job is to protect the egg.
2081001.d0: Please get me the materials before the egg hatches.
2081001.d1: Once this baby dragon sees the light, I'll make sure it hears a story about you. Thanks!

2081002.name: Ito
2081002.s0: Keep the egg warm, and the baby dragon will hatch soon.
2081002.s1: Aren't you curious to see what the baby dragon will look like?
2081002.d0: If only I were bigger, then I would have kept this egg warm myself.
2081002.d1: Thanks to you, the egg is going to be kept warm. Please drop by soon to check out the baby dragon.

2081003.name: Yaku
2081003.d0: Hurry, hurry! The egg may hatch any minute!!
2081003.d1: The baby dragon will love it, all thanks to you!

2081004.name: Pam
2081004.s1: What would be the perfect lullaby for this baby dragon? Do you want to check it out?
2081004.d0: Lalala... Oh, why hello there. Don't tell me you have been listening to me sing all this time. Oh, I'm so embarrassed.
2081004.d1: I'll sing a lullaby dedicated to you to this dragon.

2081005.name: Keroben
2081005.s0: This is off limits to everyone, so shoo! Grrr...

2081006.name: Moira
2081006.s0: I wonder how the other members are doing...
2081006.s1: If only I can break away from these shackles.
2081006.d1: It's dangerous here. Horned Tail's appointed knight Keroben is here, protecting this area.

2081007.name: Raul the Knight
2081007.n1: We need to rescue him... cough cough.
2081007.d0: We need someone that can hold this squad together.
2081007.d1: How did you find me here...?

2081009.name: Moose
2081009.d1: Remember, shields are the best form of protection.
2081009.s0: Shields are what you'd call the essence of armors.
2081009.s1: There's nothing quite as protective as that of a well-made shield.

2081010.name: Moose
2081010.s0: Shields are what you'd call the essence of armors.
2081010.s1: There's nothing quite as protective as that of a well-made shield.

2081012.name: Nix
2081012.n0: Okay, so if you look at the dragons from the biological standpoint, then...
2081012.d0: What is it? What made you barge into someone else's private forest like this?
2081012.d1: Halfrings can't even come close to here. That's just the way it is. They are cowards, that's why.

2081013.name: Frightening Marble
2081013.d0: A marble with a frightening aura about it.
2081013.d1: A marble with a frightening aura about it.

2081100.name: Harmonia
2081100.s0: Would you be interested in becoming more powerful than you ever dreamed of?
2081100.s1: I can feel something special eminating from you.
2081100.d0: Are you prepared to take steps towards becoming an even more powerful figure?

2081200.name: Gritto
2081200.s0: Becoming the wise one requires lots of training.
2081200.s1: The training may be very difficult, but the end result should really entice you.
2081200.d1: Here's hoping your vast wisdom may be utilized in a positive way.

2081300.name: Legor
2081300.s0: Are you interested in becoming a free person?
2081300.s1: Hey, you, You seem very... different.
2081300.d1: A free spirit... that's who you are now.

2081400.name: Hellin
2081400.s0: The one that lives and breathes in the shadow. You seem like someone wanting a piece of it.
2081400.s1: I can literally feel your darkness just by standing still. Would you like to try this?
2081400.d0: Have you really thought deeply into it?
2081400.d1: The true darkness coexists with light. Please remember that.

2081500.name: Samuel
2081500.n0: Do you want the freedom and powerful forces of the seas?
2081500.n1: I can feel that you're holding back both freedom and strength. Would you like to try?
2081500.d0: Have you come to find true power?

2082000.name: Mue
2082000.s0: Do you want to go to Orbis?
2082000.s1: No matter if you're an adult or a kid; the price is all the same.

2082001.name: Tommie
2082001.s0: If you're heading to Orbis, then follow me!
2082001.s1: This ship's heading to Orbis, and it will take off fairly soon.

2082002.name: Harry
2082002.s0: Eh? Are you sure you're heading to Orbis?
2082002.s1: If you want to leave this ship, then let me know. No refund, though.

2082003.name: Corba
2082003.s0: What? I can't hear you. Speak up.
2082003.s1: Am I the only Halfring remaining that knows how to transform into a dragon?
2082003.d0: Aren't you curious to find out what's past that sky? The humans and the Elves may have forgotten them, but not us Halfrings. We remember the emerald-colored aurora surrounding the temple. The #bTemple of Time#k build in between the moment and the eternity.
2082003.d1: Aren't you curious to find out what's past that sky? The humans and the Elves may have forgotten them, but not us Halfrings. We remember the emerald-colored aurora surrounding the temple. The #bTemple of Time#k build in between the moment and the eternity.

2083003.name: Stump at the Room of Maze

2084001.name: Gold Richie
2084001.d0: Hello, my name is Gold Richie and I am an internationally-renowned businessman.
2084001.d1: Hello there. The wind is heading north, which means it's a great time to get on the boat and do somet business.
2084001.n1: It's all about reading the market.

2084002.name: Gold Richie
2084002.d0: Hello, my name is Gold Richie and I am an internationally-renowned businessman.
2084002.d1: Hello there. The wind is heading north, which means it's a great time to get on the boat and do somet business.
2084002.n1: It's all about reading the market.

2084003.name: Gold Richie
2084003.d0: Hello, my name is Gold Richie and I am an internationally-renowned businessman.
2084003.d1: Hello there. The wind is heading north, which means it's a great time to get on the boat and do somet business.
2084003.n1: It's all about reading the market.

2084004.name: Gold Richie
2084004.d0: Hello, my name is Gold Richie and I am an internationally-renowned businessman.
2084004.d1: Hello there. The wind is heading north, which means it's a great time to get on the boat and do somet business.
2084004.n1: It's all about reading the market.

2084005.name: Gold Richie
2084005.d0: Hello, my name is Gold Richie and I am an internationally-renowned businessman.
2084005.d1: Hello there. The wind is heading north, which means it's a great time to get on the boat and do somet business.
2084005.n1: It's all about reading the market.

2084006.name: Gold Richie
2084006.d0: Hello, my name is Gold Richie and I am an internationally-renowned businessman.
2084006.d1: Hello there. The wind is heading north, which means it's a great time to get on the boat and do somet business.
2084006.n1: It's all about reading the market.

2084007.name: Gold Richie
2084007.d0: Hello, my name is Gold Richie and I am an internationally-renowned businessman.
2084007.d1: Hello there. The wind is heading north, which means it's a great time to get on the boat and do somet business.
2084007.n1: It's all about reading the market.

2084008.name: Gold Richie
2084008.d0: Hello, my name is Gold Richie and I am an internationally-renowned businessman.
2084008.d1: Hello there. The wind is heading north, which means it's a great time to get on the boat and do somet business.
2084008.n1: It's all about reading the market.

2090000.name: Mr. Pan
2090000.n0: You need places to store your mesos and items? Look no further!
2090000.n1: My storage is safe and secure! No worries!

2090001.name: Gong Gong
2090001.s0: Powerful weapons, in turn, make powerful Warriors.
2090001.s1: There may be a weapon to your liking here.

2090002.name: Bidiwon
2090002.s0: A solid armor will go a long way in protecting you.
2090002.s1: I'm sure you've heard stories of my armors being the best in the world.

2090003.name: Dalsuk
2090003.s0: I have everything, everything you may need to get yourself ready for the hunting ground.
2090003.s1: These potions are made from the herbs at the Herb Town nearby, so you know these are good!

2090004.name: Mr. Do
2090004.s0: Hey, aren't you the one that's supposed to go get the herbs? Eh?
2090004.s1: Eh? How come you all look similar? Aren't you the one? Eh??
2090004.d0: Back in the day, Mr. Do was respected for his intellect. Everyone knew him, the genius Mr. Do of Mu Lung!
2090004.d1: Well, my master can be extremely stubborn sometimes. He just won't admit that studying herbs will only take him so far. Studying alchemy wouldn't be such a bad idea…

2090005.name: Hak
2090005.n0: I will take you from Orbis to Mu Lung and back, as long as you have some money with you.
2090005.n1: Look, I can guarantee that my way's much faster than walking.

2090006.name: Laya
2090006.n0: Do you want to know more about pets?
2090006.n1: I suggest you take care of your pet a little more.

2090100.name: Grandpa Luo
2090100.s0: Har har, I am still the best tha Mu Lung can offer in hairstyle!
2090100.s1: Don't you want a change on your hairstyle?

2090101.name: Lilishu
2090101.s0: Let me take care of your hair today.
2090101.s1: I have a feeling your hair's going to look great after today.

2090102.name: Naran
2090102.s0: Have you ever been told that you have great skin?
2090102.s1: I'll make sure your skin color looks the way you want it to be.

2090103.name: Pata
2090103.n0: Pata can make your life much more satisfying!
2090103.n1: Hah, you can't trust me? I'm Pata the great! Haven't you heard about me?

2090104.name: Noma
2090104.s0: There are times where I can really pull it off like Pata.
2090104.s1: I've been complimented of my plastic surgery skills. Every... once ... in a while.
2090104.h0: Hmmm, I can't really tell what's wrong here.
2090104.n0: So you want your eyes done like this? Or like this?

2091000.name: No Gong
2091000.n0: Let the yin and yang flow through your body, and you'll achieve perfect harmony.
2091000.n1: Hmmm... are you ready to train yourself to achieve perfect harmony?
2091000.d0: There's nothing worse than training with the slightest case of trepidation.
2091000.d1: You're doing alright. Still a long way to go, but it's a start.

2091001.name: Do Gong
2091001.n0: Let the inner strength expand so it becomes you.
2091001.n1: Time has passed, and the world has definitely changed.
2091001.d0: I do teach people that make their way here, but it's indeed difficult to achieve perfect harmony.
2091001.d1: You'll need to really work on it in order to see improvement.

2091002.name: Tae Sang
2091002.n0: It is the taoist belief that enables me to make the best possible medicine.
2091002.n1: I wonder how Mr. Ku's doing these days... haven't seen my friend in a while.
2091002.d0: This peach isn't just a fruit; it's a medicinal ingredient.
2091002.d1: Once the peaches start growing, feel free to pluck out a couple. Good things are meant to be shared.

2091003.name: Tae Soo
2091003.n0: The owner of the Peach Farm is the great Tae Sang!
2091003.n1: My name's Tae Soo, and I've been hired recently to protect this place. Nice to meet you!
2091003.d0: Ahhh... those darn Peach Monkeys are so fast, I can't keep up with them! Not only that, but they keep throwing those precious Peaches away! And the Peach Tree seems to be dying... arrgh, What should I do?
2091003.d1: Thanks to those medicines, the Peach Trees seem to be growing as if the sky's the limit! Don't you think I deserve a bonus from Tae Sang?

2091004.name: Master Goblin
2091004.n1: Call me the King of Sage Cats! Ho ho ho!
2091004.d0: The King of Sage Cat is indeed a lover of peace. I do not wish to fight Mu Lung nor Do Gong, and I believe in peace and love more than anything else! Ho ho ho!!
2091004.d1: Ho ho ho... now that Do Gong is poisoned, no one in Mu Lung will be able to interfere with my work through spells! Pretty soon, I may call Mu Lung MY KIND OF TOWN! HOHOHO!

2091005.name: So Gong
2091005.n0: You think you can enter the Mu Lung Dojo with your skills?
2091005.n1: My master is the world's greatest! Don't mess around!
2091005.d0: Hello, Noobie. My name is Gong Gong. I train here at Mu Lung Dojo.
2091005.d1: Hello, Noobie. My name is Gong Gong. I train here at Mu Lung Dojo.

2091008.name: Jin Jin
2091008.n0: Don't talk to me. I'm busy.
2091008.n1: It's all about the beauty of space.
2091008.d0: What is it? If you're asking for drawings, no thanks. I'm too busy.
2091008.d1: What is it? If you're asking for drawings, no thanks. I'm too busy.

2091103.name: Wukong
2091103.d0: I am Wukong, the fastest and the swiftest!
2091103.d1: I am Wukong, the fastest and the swiftest!

2091105.name: Sondal
2091105.d0: Are you feeling stiff? A good fight with me will loosen you up.
2091105.d1: Are you feeling stiff? A good fight with me will loosen you up.

2091107.name: Alang
2091107.d0: There's an exciting day ahead of us! Let's go, let's go!
2091107.d1: There's an exciting day ahead of us! Let's go, let's go!

2091108.name: Yomin
2091108.d0: I want to be the strongest! Doesn't everyone?
2091108.d1: I want to be the strongest! Doesn't everyone?

2091109.name: Bonsun
2091109.d0: How have you adjusted to life at the dojo? We're all looking forward to training with you!
2091109.d1: How have you adjusted to life at the dojo? We're all looking forward to training with you!
2091109.n0: I wonder what Mr. Red Tiger is doing right now.

2091110.name: Timmy
2091110.d0: I want to be the strongest! Doesn't everyone?
2091110.d1: I want to be the strongest! Doesn't everyone?

2091111.name: Gold Dragon
2091111.d0: Come to me anytime you have questions or concerns!
2091111.d1: Come to me anytime you have questions or concerns!

2091112.name: Red Tiger
2091112.d0: We're looking forward to having you here and seeing you grow.
2091112.d1: We're looking forward to having you here and seeing you grow.

2092000.name: Mr. Ku
2092000.n0: Huh huh ... lately there have been a number of thieves stealing the herbs.
2092000.n1: I need to send these herbs to Tae Sang fast...
2092000.d0: Growing herbs takes a lot of time and effort.
2092000.d1: Even the Herb Town isn't as quiet as it used to be.

2092001.name: Captain Hwang
2092001.n0: I am in charge of all freight heading to Mu Lung.
2092001.n1: Apparently there's a Pirate Lair just past the herb field...
2092001.d0: Hmmm... where did I place that sword I used to use back in the day? I wonder if I can fight as well as I used to... but in order to protect this town, I may have no choice but to fight those evil Red-Nosed Pirates.
2092001.d1: Lord Pirate may be powerful, and so are its disciples, but I will do whatever it takes to protect this beautiful town!

2092100.name: Potter
2092100.n1: My hands aren't what they used to be. I really need to get me an apprentice.
2092100.d0: To make quality pottery, one must be in peaceful and relaxing surroundings. Those pirates just don't understand that.
2092100.d1: To make quality pottery, one must be in peaceful and relaxing surroundings. Those pirates just don't understand that.

2093000.name: Mu Tan
2093000.s0: It's pretty obvious that you'll need a powerful weapon to face those unruly Pirates.
2093000.s1: If you aren't sure whether you can face them, then trust these weapons, because they'll do their job for you.
2093000.s2: If you have any questions, feel free to ask!

2093001.name: So Won
2093001.s0: How about these shields? Don't they look awesome?
2093001.s1: Even the Pirates can't do anything against these shields!
2093001.s2: In this world of trouble, the only thing that can help you is this trusty set of armors.

2093002.name: Lan Ming
2093002.s0: Tired? Worn out? In need of a boost?
2093002.s1: These potions are made from the finest ingredients. These are perfect for restoring your health!

2093003.name: Mr. Gong
2093003.n0: You need a place to store your items and mesos? This is just the place for you!
2093003.n1: My storage is safe and secure, so no worries!

2094000.name: Guon
2094000.n0: Since when did we Bellflowers become Pirates...?
2094000.n1: Is Wu Yang doing alright? I really hope Lord Pirate isn't laying its filthy hands on him.
2094000.d0: I sincerely hope Wu Yang is alright.
2094000.d1: Bellflowers should have been taught to battle, too. It's good to live in peace, but it's disheartening to know that I am not strong enough to protect myself when the threat of violence comes in my way.

2094001.name: Wu Yang
2094001.n0: Thank you so much for saving me.
2094001.n1: Finally the Bellflowers may be out of the grasp of Lord Pirate's.

2094002.name: Guon
2094002.n0: Since when did we Bellflowers become Pirates...?
2094002.n1: Is Wu Yang doing alright? I really hope Lord Pirate isn't laying its filthy hands on him.
2094002.d0: I sincerely hope Wu Yang is alright.
2094002.d1: Bellflowers should have been taught to battle, too. It's good to live in peace, but it's disheartening to know that I am not strong enough to protect myself when the threat of violence comes in my way.

2095000.name: Delli
2095000.n0: Monsters and humans can be friends. Really.
2095000.n1: Monsters and humans can be friends. Really.
2095000.d0: You must go help Delli first!

2100000.name: Ahmad
2100000.s0: If you pay me the fees, I will guard your stuff safely.
2100000.s1: There is no place safer than mine.

2100001.name: Muhamad
2100001.n0: You need to be careful in treating Lidium.
2100001.n1: Lidium is strong but it's a beautifull mineral. Can you see this luster?

2133000.d1: The pollution of our forest began not too long ago. The one they call Mystery Man, who always wears a black robe, is responsible for it. I wonder who he is. Perhaps he's the Black Magician...?

2133004.d1: My friends were poisoned when the forest became polluted with the stuff!

2140001.d1: What do your closed eyes see, oh Goddess?  Since what is not seen does not exist...

2140002.d1: Who said there is light contained in the moon rocks and star rocks?  Who said diamonds are forever?  Don't be fooled by cheap refining and rocks that are simply rocks.  What is more precious and rare can only be found in the Temple of Time...

2140003.d1: Do you record so you don't forget?  Or do you remember so that you can record?

2141001.d1: A place where time is irrelevant like here, eternal life is easily grasped... but what's the use... when I have already been forgotten...
