9250053.d1: Do the good thing and something nice will happen to you.

9250054.name: Bicho
9250054.n1: I am going to make the biggest snowman in the world!
9250054.d0: Snowman!  I love it!  Nothing represents winter like the Snowman!
9250054.d1: Ahhh! My hands are freezing.  Please help me make the biggest snowman in the world.

9270017.name: Xinga
9270017.n0: We certainly provide you the best service in the air.
9270017.n1: We promise you that you will reach Singapore in a blink of an eye!

9270018.name: Kerny
9270018.n0: Did you enjoy your trip to Singapore?
9270018.n1: I bet you will want to come back to CBD!

9270019.name: Chan
9270019.n0: I only deal with Heavy duty weapons.
9270019.n1: Hey, Hey, Hey, watch out Kid! The weapons are hot!

9270020.name: Hui Ting
9270020.n0: It all begins with defending yourself first.
9270020.n1: How are you planning to attack when you can't defend yourself.

9270021.name: Wendy
9270021.n0: What a beautiful weather in Singapore.
9270021.n1: Remember, the potions are verrry good for your health, my dear.

9270022.name: Candy
9270022.n0: First time in Singapore? You gotta see Merlion then...
9270022.n1: My potions are different from others! You will love it!

9270023.name: Noel
9270023.n0: Oops... Sorry... My hands are little bit shaky...
9270023.n1: Let me help you on that... I can almost do it for you for free.

9270024.name: Kelvin
9270024.n0: Want a brand new life? I am the person you want to talk to!
9270024.n1: Let me help you get a boyfriend my lady~!

9270025.name: Xan
9270025.n0: Sun breezing Singapore~ Bet you can't live without tanning!
9270025.n1: My skins are just so beautiful... Aren't they?

9270026.name: Sixx
9270026.n0: Oh... My... Glasses... Sometimes it is too heavy...
9270026.n1: Wanna change your eye color to look more attractive?

9270027.name: Alwyn
9270027.n1: All you can see and eat in Singapore!!!

9270028.name: Adrian
9270028.n0: We would like to keep our streets clean!
9270028.n1: Hey, you are not about to throw that on the streets, right?
9270028.d0: Law is the only reliable defense you can have ...
9270028.d1: Thanks for helping me now... CBD looks much safer now. I should recommend you for some kind of award.

9270029.name: Johnson
9270029.n1: Acheww~~ I think I have a cold~
9270029.d0: Acheww~~~ I can't believe I got a cold in this warm weather.
9270029.d1: Thank you very much for helping me out. I hope I will get an A+ tomorrow for my test.

9270030.name: Ralph the wanderer
9270030.n0: I miss the old days man.
9270030.n1: We were afraid of nothing. Absolutely nothing.
9270030.d0: I miss the old days man.
9270030.d1: I still miss my old days man.

9270031.name: Dave & Iris
9270031.n0: Oh~ho~ho~ We are in love... So in love...
9270031.n1: Somebody please take a picture of us?
9270031.d0: Hi there~ How do we look? Aren't we just perfect for each other?
9270031.d1: Wow, we didn't think we would see you again. Anyway, feel free to take pictures with us.~

9270032.name: Angie
9270032.n0: Hey, what's that you are wearing? I think I am gonna buy that too!
9270032.n1: Can you PLEASE dress more properly? Gosh!
9270032.d0: Hey..... Come on... Is that all you can show me about your fashion?
9270032.d1: Hey... it is you again... Thanks for helping me out.... I am so gald to see my closet full of clothes. Oh, feel free to grab one if you want.

9270033.name: Bob
9270033.n0: No one knows what will happen inside the ghost ship...
9270033.n1: Not many of them has returned after entering this gigantic ship.
9270033.d0: It was never like this in old days....
9270033.d1: Hope number of ghosts in the ship has reduced...

9270034.name: Airu
9270034.n0: Okay Guys~ Test tomorrow! Be there or be squared!
9270034.n1: Study extra 8 hours day at home and you will be someone like me~
9270034.d0: Students~ you better study~ How can I help you honey~?
9270034.d1: Hey, you are the one who helped Johnson. How is he doing? Please tell him not to forget about his test tomorrow~

9270035.name: Eunice
9270035.n1: Would you like some Souvenirs for your friends?

9270036.name: Eric
9270036.n0: That's right! It's the Quick Hand I am talking about!
9270036.n1: I can make you look like a movie star!

9270037.name: Jimmy
9270037.n0: Eric has the fastest hand in town... I envy that...
9270037.n1: I think I am gonna cut my hair first just for practicing.

9270038.name: Shalon
9270038.n0: Please report to the appropriate gates. We are Boarding now!

9270039.name: Sureen
9270039.n0: Home Sweet Home~ Nothing is better than being home~
9270039.n1: How do you like the world's most beautiful country, Singapore?
9270039.d0: We need to make and keep Singapore as clean as possible!
9270039.d1: With a citizen like you, the city will be as clean as our own home... You keep that in mind.

9270041.name: Irene
9270041.n0: Please report to the appropriate gates~ We are Boarding now!
9270041.n1: Enjoy your shopping at Duty free shops!

9270042.name: Mr. Hwang
9270042.n0: You need a place to store your items and mesos? Here it is!
9270042.n1: My storage is safe and secure, so no worries!

9270044.name: Commando Jim
9270044.n0: I'm the leader of an Ulu patrol squad. Join us! Help us defeat all the monsters in Ulu City!
9270044.n1: Great work defeating the Dukus. But it seems like there's something else going on...

9270045.name: Commando Jim
9270045.n0: I'm the leader of an Ulu patrol squad. Join us! Help us defeat all the monsters in Ulu City!
9270045.n1: Great work defeating the Dukus. But it seems like there's something else going on...

9270047.name: Aldol
9270047.n0: I'm looking for a group of brave men and women!
9270047.n1: I can get you to the Spooky World. Talk to me if you want to go there.

9270054.name: Encik Musa
9270054.n0: Everything will be safe with me.
9270054.n1: Do you need to put anything into safe-keeping?

9270055.name: Chiang
9270055.n0: Come in and see what you need.
9270055.n1: We have a lot of varieties to choose from.

9270056.name: Riduan
9270056.n0: I may look Old, but I am Strong.
9270056.n1: Come and challenge me if you dare...

9270057.name: Kok Hua
9270057.n1: Come here, I will tell you a secret...

9270058.name: Hurliza
9270058.n0: I hope my daddy is okay...
9270058.d0: It's really important to be in style, you know...
9270058.d1: Some say I'm a party girl, and they are right because I love to party!

9270059.name: Nuri
9270059.n1: I want to eat well and look beautiful.
9270059.d1: I'm so hungry. I'm going to go eat something.

9270060.name: Chee Wee
9270060.n1: Blondie is my blonde Kitty Cat.
9270060.d0: What a wonderful day. Isn't that wonderful?
9270060.d1: Blondie is the coolest cat I've ever had.

9270061.name: Village Chief Malek
9270061.n0: With Coconut Husks to feast on...
9270061.n1: ...and soothing music, life in Kampung Village is great!
9270061.d0: Hello, visitors. Welcome to Kampung Village. I'm the chief of this village, Malek.
9270061.d1: Recently many tourists are visiting my village, which is good for the town economy indeed.

9270062.name: Lam
9270062.n0: It seems like I am stuck here forever.
9270062.n1: I have some Dream Places to visit.
9270062.d0: It's nice to live an old-fashioned lifestyle in Kampung...
9270062.d1: But I guess I want to see what's out there...

9270063.name: Mutu
9270063.n0: Hey! What are you looking at?
9270063.n1: Do I look good with Bunny Ears?

9270065.name: Ali
9270065.n1: I have all you need here...

9300010.name: Mr. Moneybags
9300010.n1: I wonder who can bring me some red envelopes...

9300011.name: Cai Shen
9300011.n0: Come test your luck with Gachapon!!
9300011.n1: Who knows? You may even get a nice item!!
9300011.d1: I can only make these Dumplings and Long Thread Moss Soup randomly every 12 hours.  So, if you want more, come back to me after 12 hours upon receiving these dishes.

9300012.name: Guan Zhong
9300012.n0: I'm Guan Zhong, the Prime Minister of Qi. Have you heard of "The Friendship of Guan and Bao"? That's my story. Haha...
9300012.n1: You wish to unlock the seal? I'm the one you should look for!
9300012.n2: You wish to have the key to unlock the seal? I can help you!
9300012.d1: Sharing... such a word that warms up my heart.  I hope you understand what I mean...

9300013.name: Sima Qian
9300013.n0: Have you seen my history book? I'm Sima Qian, the historian.
9300013.n1: Please take good care of your account!
9300013.d1: I can only make these steamed fish and roasted chicken randomly every 12 hours.  So, if you want more, come back to me after 12 hours upon receiving these dishes.

9300014.name: Zhang Liang
9300014.n0: I'm Zhang Liang, I'm also known as Zhang Zi Fang.
9300014.n1: To prevent from been stolen, please take extra care!
9300014.n2: You can't drop, trade or sell sealed items.
9300014.d1: It is all about friendship...  Look around you!  There are so many things that you can share with your friends to make the world a better place!

9300016.name: Takeshi
9300016.n0: Another soul falls victim to the criminals of this town...
9300016.n1: When will this needless violence end?
9300016.d0: Another soul falls victim to the criminals of this town...
9300016.d1: The streets and alleys are safe again, and you are one of the sentinels who helped fill the darkness in this town with order and light. Thank you for your service.

9310000.name: Hong the Pilot
9310000.n0: Sky... the road of my life...

9310001.name: Lady Li
9310001.n0: If you don't have enough money to buy weapons here, then go away!
9310001.n1: This is cheap to begin with. Don't  you ever try bargaining with me!

9310002.name: Owner Jang
9310002.n0: Hehe... I better sell these fast so I can go drink...  hehe
9310002.n1: Hehe...  I've been selling armors here for 10 years now...

9310003.name: Lady Jin
9310003.n0: Welcome, welcome~ Are you looking fors something?
9310003.n1: I can't hook you up with discounts. I only work here part-time.

9310004.name: Officer Lim
9310004.n0: Sir, sir! You cannot throw trash away like that, or I'll have to fine you!
9310004.n1: The laws are there to be followed.
9310004.d1: Is there anything I can help you with?

9310005.name: Officer Chung
9310005.n0: It's off-limits beyond this point. Please turn around.
9310005.n1: I'm on duty. Please don't try me.
9310005.d0: (Salute) I'll have to stop you here. I'm Officer Chung, in charge of the security to this premise.
9310005.d1: Please leave. If you do not cooperate, then I'll have to forcefully make you leave this premise.

9310006.name: Officer Huh
9310006.n0: If you need any help, feel free to contact us!
9310006.n1: We are here to serve you!

9310007.name: Officer Kang
9310007.n0: Don't mistake me for a celebrity! I'm a police officer!
9310007.n1: Ah, the popularity. I'm sick of it! Ladies! No false reports just to see me~
9310007.d1: Is there anything I can help you with?

9310008.name: Chief Officer Chu
9310008.n0: I'm the chief officer of Shanghai!
9310008.n1: Do you have any questions on us police officers?
9310008.d0: Hello, there. I'm Chief Officer Chu, in charge of the security of Shanghai.
9310008.d1: I'm in charge of protecting the city of Shanghai.

9310009.name: Ms. Jo
9310009.n0: It's awwwfully tiring to work in the farms when it's this hot!
9310009.n1: I understand I have a stroooong aaaccent.
9310009.d1: Farming is difficult, but it is very rewaaarding~

9310010.name: Mr. Yang
9310010.n1: Farming is bery bery difficult. Don't ever think this is a walk in the park!
9310010.d0: Ouch, my back. Farming really takes a toll on my body.
9310010.d1: Farming is difficult, but it sure is rewarding!

9310011.name: Owner Yeo
9310011.n0: Hey, my food is REALLY REALLY good!
9310011.n1: I may be selling these in the streets, but it sure is delicious!
9310011.d0: They call me Master Chef Yeo here in Shanghai!!
9310011.d1: Thank you for your help last time. It really helped me a great deal!

9310012.name: Cho the photographer
9310012.n1: I'll try my best to capture your beauty in this camera.
9310012.d0: Hey there, I'm Cho the Photographer.
9310012.d1: I'm busy these days taking pictures here and there.

9310013.name: Yang the Pilot
9310013.n0: Not everyone's blessed with a job like me - flying around the sky at will!
9310013.n1: It is quite scary looking down at the ground when you're waaaay up there.

9310030.name: Chienchien
9310030.n0: Shaolin secret formula potions and miscellaneous items for sale! Come and get them!
9310030.n1: For a man who wanders the underworld, getting hurt is normal.
9310030.d0: We have premium potions made with Shaolin's secret recipes as well as special candles for offering. Feel free to look around.
9310030.d1: We have premium potions made with Shaolin's secret recipes as well as special candles for offering. Feel free to look around.
9310030.s0: There's nothing quite like a refreshing drink in the humid heat up here!

9310031.name: Xiaoyezi
9310031.n0: Actually the business is going well here.
9310031.n1: I would rather die than to have my hair messed up.
9310031.s0: Did you know that the haircut is the first thing people notice?

9310032.name: Mrs. Diu
9310032.n0: Occasionally we have customers who are secularized monks.
9310032.s0: Come in! The salon is open!

9310033.name: Zhongzhao Jin
9310033.n0: My armors are exclusively from Shaolin Monastery.
9310033.n1: When you put on my armors, you won't get hurt
9310033.s0: Armor up, adventurer! You'll need these if you intend to leave this town.

9310034.name: Dabao
9310034.n0: Even kung-fu masters should take care of their skin.
9310034.n1: We train our inner chakra as well as our bones and muscles.
9310034.s0: My scalp shines like a polished gem. That is the result of a proper skin-care routine.

9310035.name: Liaofan
9310035.n0: I'm really good at shaving heads.
9310035.n1: Religious practice is all about the heart and has nothing to do with hair.
9310035.d0: No hair no worries, but a beard is a must.
9310035.d1: No hair no worries, but a beard is a must.
9310035.s0: I know I have no hair of my own, but I guarantee that I can cut yours!

9310036.name: Yunping
9310036.n0: The authentic art of disguise, completely face-off
9310036.n1: Service also includes human skin mask made to order
9310036.s0: Get your make-over here! People won't recognise you in the street!

9310037.name: Ruhua
9310037.n0: Apprentice of the art of disguise who uses her clients as lab rats
9310037.n1: While safety is guaranteed, the outcome is not.
9310037.s0: Let me fix you up real quick! I'm sure you'll be fine!

9310038.name: Polang Sha
9310038.n0: I am the one and only weapon supplier of Shaolin Temple!
9310038.s0: I have the sharpest weapons in stock. They can cleave trees in a single blow!

9310039.name: Dharma Scroll
9310039.d0: I am a scroll and cannot speak.
9310039.d1: I am a scroll and cannot speak.

9310040.name: Guoqing
9310040.n1: One day in the secular world requires a hundred years of religious practice to compensate.
9310040.d0: The road to enlightenment has no end. One must follow his heart.
9310040.d1: The road to enlightenment has no end. One must follow his heart.

9310041.name: Receptionist monk
9310041.n0: Humans can be monsters, and monsters can be human.
9310041.n1: Shaolin is closed to visitors now. Please try another day...Namo amitabha...
9310041.d0: Shaolin is a millennium old sacred land of Buddhism. Please take care when you look around.
9310041.d1: Shaolin is a millennium old sacred land of Buddhism. Please take care when you look around.

9310042.name: Hermit Qingwa
9310042.d0: This is a little tricky. You better go and do something else for now.
9310042.d1: This is a little tricky. You better go and do something else for now.

9310043.name: Fuzi
9310043.n0: Our service is based on herbal extracts, both monks and ordinary people can use it.
9310043.n1: Our bodies are sacred, so we shall treat them as temples.

9310044.name: Dharma Scroll
9310044.d0: I am a scroll and cannot speak.
9310044.d1: I am a scroll and cannot speak.

9310046.name: Chengguan
9310046.n0: If we add this here, well...
9310046.n1: What's the smell that monsters hate...
9310046.d0: Demon slaying is one of the ways to achieve enlightenment.
9310046.d1: Demon slaying is one of the ways to achieve enlightenment.
9310046.s0: Be careful around the scriptures! They are originals!!

9310047.name: Chengxin
9310047.s0: The key to mastery lies in the heart, never forget that.

9310048.name: Janitor monk
9310048.n1: It's dangerous here! Gotta hurry up and take cover...
9310048.d0: Shaolin is a millennium old sacred land of Buddhism. Please take care when you look around.
9310048.d1: Shaolin is a millennium old sacred land of Buddhism. Please take care when you look around.
9310048.s0: I understand now, finally. The key lies in the heart.

9310049.name: Elder Cheng
9310049.n1: The world-famous Shaolin Monastery is nearby.
9310049.d0: I can't believe it even though I saw it with my own eyes.
9310049.d1: I wonder how is the Shaolin Master doing...
9310049.s0: Roads aren't safe to travel anymore... What happened to the peace?

9310050.name: Laoma
9310050.n0: In Laoma Warehouse, safety comes first.
9310050.n1: Making good use of the warehouse is essential to an outstanding adventurer.
9310050.s0: My storage has an excellent reputation... for a reason.

9310051.name: Master Haifeng
9310051.n0: Success comes from hard work. Devotion to training is the way to growth.
9310051.n1: The completion of martial arts training depends on a kind heart.
9310051.d0: It is still not found. What should we do now?
9310051.d1: It is still not found. What should we do now?
9310051.s0: Pain is merely an illusion that you allow yourself to perceive.

9310052.name: Xuzhu
9310052.n0: I must practice, practice, and after that, practice some more. One day I will be a master.
9310052.n1: Have you seen my fellow brother Guoqing? He still has not returned...

9310053.name: Master Xuanci
9310053.s0: How is my old friend, Elder Cheng?

9310057.name: Dr. P
9310057.n0: Hello~ I'm Dr. P. Do you think the English hard to study?
9310057.n1: Welcome to challenge my town! There are huge prizes...

9310058.name: Santa
9310058.n1: Ah! Christmas has come. Have you been waiting for me?
9310058.d0: I heard you can go to Happyville if you find Rooney.
9310058.d1: Rooney can be found in Ellinia, El Nath, and Ludibrium.

9310082.name: Please double click on Adventure TV to view official website news.

9330000.name: 란
9330000.n1: 다양한 메뉴가 준비되어 있답니다. 구경하고 가세요~

9330001.name: 황씨
9330001.n0: 좋은 무기를 알아 볼 수 있는 안목을 가진 사람은 흔치않지.
9330001.n1: 정말 좋은 무기는 스스로 주인을 선택한다고 하더군.

9330002.name: 제갈윤
9330002.n0: 이쁜 누나~ 여기 이 옷 한번 입어봐. 정말 딱이겠는데~!
9330002.n1: 거기 지나가는 형님~ 이 옷을 입으면 스타일이 살아난다니까~

9330003.name: 주걸균
9330003.d0: 안녕하세요? 저는 대만의 최고 멋쟁이 주걸균입니다.

9330004.name: 채이림
9330004.n0: 호호호~ 대만은 정말 살기 좋은 곳이에요.

9330007.name: 포청
9330007.n1: 곧 지하철이 개통될 예정이에요. 조금만 기다려주세요~

9330014.name: 조위
9330014.n1: 곧 지하철이 개통될 예정이에요. 조금만 기다려주세요~

9330016.name: 요리사 아종
9330016.d0: 내가 만든 요리가 먹고 싶어서 찾아온 거야?
9330016.d1: 재료를 썰어 기름두른  팬에 넣어 달달 볶고~ 요리는 너무 즐거워♪

9330017.name: 껌팔이 소녀
9330017.n1: 맛있는 껌이 있어요. 풍선껌,자일리톨껌 종류가 많아요~

9330018.name: 노점상 주인 오씨
9330018.n1: 장사를 하기엔 재료가 부족한데... 날 도와줄 사람은 없나?
9330018.d1: 요즘 장사가 잘 되지 않아 걱정이라네.

9330019.name: 쥬디
9330019.n0: 저도 빨리 대만 최고의 헤어 스타일리스트가 되고 싶어요.
9330019.n1: 제 남자친구는 말이죠..... 후훗~ 비밀이랍니다. 빨리 그가 보고싶어요.

9330020.name: 크리스틴
9330020.n1: 대만 최신 유행 스타일 소품이 많이 있어요.

9330023.name: 허치희
9330023.n0: 더 예뻐지길 원하시나요? 저에게 맡겨만 주세요.

9330024.name: 곽이랑
9330024.n0: 원장선생님만큼은 아니지만 예쁜 얼굴로 바꿔 드릴 수 있어요.

9330025.name: 소부현
9330025.n1: 맑고 투명한 피부를 원하신다고요? 저에게만 맡겨주세요.

9330026.name: 동네 총각
9330026.n1: 하아~ 왠지 모르게 한숨만 나오는군요. 외로워서 그럴까?

9330027.name: 동네 아가씨
9330027.n0: 야시장에 파는 음식들은 너무 맛있어. 그래서 다이어트에 방해가 된다구...
9330027.n1: 가끔은 이곳에서 멀리 떠나고 싶단 말이야~ 어디가 좋을까?

9330028.name: 과일가게 할아버지
9330028.n1: 허허허... 늙어서 장사가 조금 힘들긴 해...

9330029.name: 유유
9330029.n1: 야시장 밖은 위험하답니다. 위험한 곳에서는 물약은 필수죠.

9330030.name: 불량 청소년
9330030.n0: 뭘 보고 그래? 가던 길이나 가라고!
9330030.n1: 이 세상의 규칙따위에 얽매이지 않을 뿐이라고... 그러니까 상관마!

9330032.name: 과일가게 할아버지
9330032.n1: 허허허... 늙어서 장사가 조금 힘들긴 해...

9330045.name: Kedrick
9330045.n0: Come try it and you will be rewarded unexpectedly!
9330045.n1: Fishing is all about patience and effort... An ART...
